trans-unit.source: This abstract class is the superclass of all classes representing an output stream of bytes. An output stream accepts output bytes and sends them to some sink.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类是所有代表字节输出流的类的超类。一个输出流接受输出字节,并将它们发送到某个汇。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to represent a referral exception, which is generated in response to a referral such as that returned by LDAP v3 servers.
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类用于表示引用异常，该异常是为响应诸如LDAP v3服务器返回的引用而生成的。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to represent an LDAP referral exception.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类用于表示LDAP引用异常。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to represent an LDAP referral exception. It extends the base ReferralException by providing a getReferralContext() method that accepts request controls. LdapReferralException is an abstract class. Concrete implementations of it determine its synchronization and serialization properties.
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类用于表示LDAP引用异常。通过提供接受请求控件的 getReferralContext() 方法，它扩展了基本 ReferralException 。LdapReferralException是一个抽象类。它的具体实现决定了它的同步和序列化属性。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to serve as a color space tag to identify the specific color space of a Color object or, via a ColorModel object, of an Image, a BufferedImage, or a GraphicsDevice.
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类用作颜色空间标记，以标识 Color 对象或通过 ColorModel 对象， Image ， BufferedImage 或 GraphicsDevice 的特定颜色空间。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to serve as a color space tag to identify the specific color space of a Color object or, via a ColorModel object, of an Image, a BufferedImage, or a GraphicsDevice. It contains methods that transform colors in a specific color space to/from sRGB and to/from a well-defined CIEXYZ color space.
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类用作颜色空间标记，以标识 Color 对象或通过 ColorModel 对象， Image ， BufferedImage 或 GraphicsDevice 的特定颜色空间。它包含将特定颜色空间中的颜色转换为sRGB和定义良好的CIEXYZ颜色空间的方法。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to serve as a color space tag to identify the specific color space of a Color object or, via a ColorModel object, of an Image, a BufferedImage, or a GraphicsDevice.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类用于作为颜色空间标签,以识别Color对象的特定颜色空间,或通过ColorModel对象识别Image、BufferedImage或GraphicsDevice的特定颜色空间。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class is used to serve as a color space tag to identify the specific color space of a Color object or, via a ColorModel object, of an Image, a BufferedImage, or a GraphicsDevice. It contains methods that transform colors in a specific color space to/from sRGB and to/from a well-defined CIEXYZ color space.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类被用作色彩空间标签,用于识别Color对象的特定色彩空间,或通过ColorModel对象识别Image、BufferedImage或GraphicsDevice的特定色彩空间。它包含了将特定色彩空间中的颜色转换为/从sRGB和转换为/从一个明确定义的CIEXYZ色彩空间的方法。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class must be implemented with care to ensure other classes operate correctly. All implementations that can be instantiated must be final, immutable and thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类的实现必须谨慎,以确保其他类的正确运行。所有可以实例化的实现必须是最终的、不可变的和线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides default implementations for most of the methods in the TableModel interface.
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类为 TableModel 接口中的大多数方法提供默认实现。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides default implementations for most of the methods in the TableModel interface. It takes care of the management of listeners and provides some conveniences for generating TableModelEvents and dispatching them to the listeners. To create a concrete TableModel as a subclass of AbstractTableModel you need only provide implementations for the following three methods:
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类为 TableModel 接口中的大多数方法提供默认实现。它负责侦听器的管理，并为生成 TableModelEvents 并将其分派给侦听器提供了一些便利。要将具体的 TableModel 创建为 AbstractTableModel 的子类，只需提供以下三种方法的实现：

trans-unit.source: This abstract class represents a factory for creating LDAPv3 controls.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类代表了一个创建LDAPv3控件的工厂。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class represents a factory for creating LDAPv3 controls. LDAPv3 controls are defined in RFC 2251.
trans-unit.target: 该抽象类表示创建LDAPv3控件的工厂。LDAPv3控件在RFC 2251中定义。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class represents a factory for creating LDAPv3 controls. LDAPv3 controls are defined in RFC 2251.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象类表示用于创建LDAPv3控件的工厂。LDAPv3控件在RFC 2251中定义。

trans-unit.source: This abstract method needs to be implemented by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象方法需要由子类来实现。

trans-unit.source: This abstract method needs to be implemented by subclasses. Its responsibility is to iterate over the elements and use the write() methods to generate output in the desired format.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象方法需要由子类来实现。它的职责是对元素进行迭代,并使用write()方法生成所需格式的输出。

trans-unit.source: This abstract subclass of DragGestureRecognizer defines a DragGestureRecognizer for mouse-based gestures.
trans-unit.target: DragGestureRecognizer 的这个抽象子类为基于鼠标的手势定义了一个 DragGestureRecognizer 。

trans-unit.source: This abstract subclass of DragGestureRecognizer defines a DragGestureRecognizer for mouse-based gestures. Each platform implements its own concrete subclass of this class, available via the Toolkit.createDragGestureRecognizer() method, to encapsulate the recognition of the platform dependent mouse gesture(s) that initiate a Drag and Drop operation.
trans-unit.target: DragGestureRecognizer 的这个抽象子类为基于鼠标的手势定义了一个 DragGestureRecognizer 。每个平台都实现自己的此类的具体子类，可通过Toolkit.createDragGestureRecognizer（）方法获得此子类，以封装对依赖于平台的鼠标手势的识别，这些鼠标手势将启动拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: This access mode is supported by all VarHandle instances and never throws UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 所有VarHandle实例都支持此访问模式，并且永远不会抛出 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: This acquires a read lock on the associated document for the duration of the update to ensure the model is not changed while it is operating. The first thing to do would be to see if any work actually needs to be done. The following could have conceivably happened while the state was waiting to be updated:
trans-unit.target: 这将在更新期间获得相关文档的读锁,以确保模型在运行时不被更改。首先要做的是看看是否真的需要做任何工作。在状态等待更新的过程中,可以想象会发生以下情况。

trans-unit.source: This activity is normal, although it may cause puzzling entries to be created in web-server logs. If a web server is not configured correctly, however, then this activity may cause the provider-loading algorithm to fail spuriously.
trans-unit.target: 这种活动是正常的,尽管它可能会导致在网络服务器日志中创建令人费解的条目。但是,如果Web服务器的配置不正确,那么这项活动可能会导致提供者加载算法虚假地失败。

trans-unit.source: This adapter does not test for duplicate Namespace-qualified attribute names.
trans-unit.target: 这个适配器不测试重复的命名空间限定的属性名。

trans-unit.source: This address has now been confirmed as a valid address.
trans-unit.target: 这个地址现已被确认为有效地址。

trans-unit.source: This address has now been made to be the primary destination address.
trans-unit.target: 现在这个地址已经成为主要目的地址。

trans-unit.source: This address is now reachable.
trans-unit.target: 这个地址现在是可以到达的。

trans-unit.source: This adds a new provider to those currently available. A provider supplies rules for one or more zone IDs. A provider cannot be registered if it supplies a zone ID that has already been registered. See the notes on time-zone IDs in ZoneId, especially the section on using the concept of a "group" to make IDs unique.
trans-unit.target: 这会将新的提供程序添加到当前可用的提供程序中。提供者为一个或多个区域ID提供规则。如果提供程序提供了已注册的区域ID，则无法注册。请参阅 ZoneId 中有关时区ID的注释，尤其是有关使用“组”概念使ID唯一的部分。

trans-unit.source: This adds the amount to the days unit in a copy of this period. The years and months units are unaffected. For example, "1 year, 6 months and 3 days" plus 2 days returns "1 year, 6 months and 5 days".
trans-unit.target: 这样就会在本期副本的天数单位中增加金额。年和月单位不受影响。例如,"1年6个月零3天 "加上2天,返回 "1年6个月零5天"。

trans-unit.source: This adds the amount to the months unit in a copy of this period. The years and days units are unaffected. For example, "1 year, 6 months and 3 days" plus 2 months returns "1 year, 8 months and 3 days".
trans-unit.target: 这样就会将金额添加到本期副本的月份单位中。年和日单位不受影响。例如,"1年6个月零3天 "加上2个月,返回 "1年8个月零3天"。

trans-unit.source: This adds the amount to the years unit in a copy of this period. The months and days units are unaffected. For example, "1 year, 6 months and 3 days" plus 2 years returns "3 years, 6 months and 3 days".
trans-unit.target: 这就将该金额添加到本期副本的年单位中。月和日单位不受影响。例如,"1年6个月3天 "加上2年,返回 "3年6个月3天"。

trans-unit.source: This adds the specified number of hours to this time, returning a new time. The calculation wraps around midnight.
trans-unit.target: 这将指定的小时数加到这个时间上,返回一个新的时间。计算在午夜前后进行。

trans-unit.source: This adds the specified number of minutes to this time, returning a new time. The calculation wraps around midnight.
trans-unit.target: 这将在这个时间上增加指定的分钟数,返回一个新的时间。计算在午夜前后进行。

trans-unit.source: This adds the specified number of nanoseconds to this time, returning a new time. The calculation wraps around midnight.
trans-unit.target: 这将在这个时间上增加指定的纳秒数,返回一个新的时间。计算在午夜前后进行。

trans-unit.source: This adds the specified number of seconds to this time, returning a new time. The calculation wraps around midnight.
trans-unit.target: 这将在这个时间上增加指定的秒数,返回一个新的时间。计算过程在午夜前后进行。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts the specified temporal object using the logic encapsulated in the implementing class. Examples might be an adjuster that sets the date avoiding weekends, or one that sets the date to the last day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 这将使用实现类中封装的逻辑调整指定的时间对象。例子可能是一个避开周末设置日期的调整器,或者是一个将日期设置为每月最后一天的调整器。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts this date-time according to the rules of the specified adjuster. A simple adjuster might simply set the one of the fields, such as the year field. A more complex adjuster might set the date to the last day of the month. A selection of common adjustments is provided in TemporalAdjusters. These include finding the "last day of the month" and "next Wednesday". The adjuster is responsible for handling special cases, such as the varying lengths of month and leap years.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的调节器的规则调整此日期时间。一个简单的调节器可以简单地设置一个字段，例如Year字段。更复杂的调节器可能会将日期设置为该月的最后一天。在 TemporalAdjusters 中提供了一些常用调整的选择。其中包括找到“每月的最后一天”和“下一个星期三”。调节器负责处理特殊情况，例如不同长度的月份和leap年。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts this date-time according to the rules of the specified adjuster. A simple adjuster might simply set the one of the fields, such as the year field. A more complex adjuster might set the date to the last day of the month. A selection of common adjustments is provided in TemporalAdjusters. These include finding the "last day of the month" and "next Wednesday". The adjuster is responsible for handling special cases, such as the varying lengths of month and leap years.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的调节器的规则调整此日期时间。一个简单的调节器可以简单地设置一个字段，例如Year字段。更复杂的调节器可能会将日期设置为该月的最后一天。在 TemporalAdjusters 中提供了一些常用调整的选择。其中包括找到“每月的最后一天”和“下一个星期三”。调节器负责处理特殊情况，例如不同长度的月份和leap年。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts this temporal, adding according to the rules of the specified amount. The amount is typically a Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface, such as Duration.
trans-unit.target: 这将调整此时间，并根据指定数量的规则添加。该金额通常是一个 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型，例如 Duration 。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts this temporal, adding according to the rules of the specified amount. The amount is typically a Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface, such as Duration.
trans-unit.target: 这将调整此时间，并根据指定数量的规则添加。该金额通常是一个 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型，例如 Duration 。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts this temporal, subtracting according to the rules of the specified amount. The amount is typically a Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface, such as Duration.
trans-unit.target: 这将调整此时间，并根据指定数量的规则减去。该金额通常是一个 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型，例如 Duration 。

trans-unit.source: This adjusts this temporal, subtracting according to the rules of the specified amount. The amount is typically a Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface, such as Duration.
trans-unit.target: 这将调整此时间，并根据指定数量的规则减去。该金额通常是一个 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型，例如 Duration 。

trans-unit.source: This affects how cells are wrapped. See the documentation of setLayoutOrientation(int) for more details.
trans-unit.target: 这会影响细胞的包装方式。有关更多详细信息，请参见 setLayoutOrientation(int) 的文档。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is described in the CertPathBuilder section of the Java Security Standard Algorithm Names Specification. Consult the release documentation for your implementation to see if any other algorithms are supported.
trans-unit.target: Java安全标准算法名称规范的CertPathBuilder部分描述了此算法。请查阅发行文档以了解您的实现，以了解是否支持其他算法。

trans-unit.target: Java安全标准算法名称规范的CertPathValidator部分描述了此算法。请查阅发行文档以了解您的实现，以了解是否支持其他算法。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is described in the CertPathBuilder section of the Java Security Standard Algorithm Names Specification. Consult the release documentation for your implementation to see if any other algorithms are supported.
trans-unit.target: Java安全标准算法名称规范的CertPathBuilder部分描述了此算法。请查阅发行文档以了解您的实现，以了解是否支持其他算法。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is described in the KeyAgreement section of the Java Security Standard Algorithm Names Specification. Consult the release documentation for your implementation to see if any other algorithms are supported.
trans-unit.target: Java安全标准算法名称规范的“密钥协议”部分描述了此算法。请查阅发行文档以了解您的实现，以了解是否支持其他算法。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is described in the TrustManagerFactory section of the Java Security Standard Algorithm Names Specification. Consult the release documentation for your implementation to see if any other algorithms are supported.
trans-unit.target: Java安全标准算法名称规范的TrustManagerFactory部分中介绍了此算法。请查阅发行文档以了解您的实现，以了解是否支持其他算法。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is described in the CertPathBuilder section of the Java Cryptography Architecture Standard Algorithm Name Documentation. Consult the release documentation for your implementation to see if any other algorithms are supported.
trans-unit.target: Java密码体系结构体系结构标准算法名称文档的CertPathBuilder部分描述了此算法。请查阅发布文档以了解您的实现，以了解是否支持其他算法。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is implemented by this method. If it is overridden, the behavior specified here must be maintained.
trans-unit.target: 这个算法是由这个方法实现的。如果它被重写,则必须保持这里指定的行为。

trans-unit.source: This allows a DateTimeFormatter to be created. All date-time formatters are created ultimately using this builder.
trans-unit.target: 这允许创建 DateTimeFormatter 。最终所有的日期时间格式化程序都是使用此构建器创建的。

trans-unit.source: This allows a number of week-based-years to be added to, or subtracted from, a date. The unit is equal to either 52 or 53 weeks. The estimated duration of a week-based-year is the same as that of a standard ISO year at 365.2425 Days.
trans-unit.target: 这允许将多个基于周的年份添加到日期或从日期中减去。单位等于52或53周。以周为基础的年份的估计持续时间与标准ISO年的 365.2425 Days 。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to control the VirtualMachineManager and cause the system to misbehave.
trans-unit.target: 这使攻击者可以控制 VirtualMachineManager 并导致系统行为异常。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to control the runtime characteristics of the Java virtual machine and cause the system to misbehave. An attacker can also access some information related to the running application.
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以控制Java虚拟机的运行时特性,并导致系统行为不当。攻击者还可以获取与运行中的应用程序有关的一些信息。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to control the target VM which can potentially cause it to misbehave.
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以控制目标虚拟机,从而有可能导致其行为不当。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to create an AttachProvider which can potentially be used to attach to other Java virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 这允许攻击者创建一个AttachProvider,该AttachProvider有可能被用于附加到其他Java虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to create thread groups and set their run priority.
trans-unit.target: 这允许攻击者创建线程组并设置其运行优先级。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to modify the behaviour of any thread in the system.
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以修改系统中任何线程的行为。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to mount a denial-of-service attack by automatically forcing the virtual machine to halt. Note: The "exitVM.*" permission is automatically granted to all code loaded from the application class path, thus enabling applications to terminate themselves. Also, the "exitVM" permission is equivalent to "exitVM.*".
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以通过自动强制虚拟机停止来发动拒绝服务攻击。注意:"exitVM.*"权限会自动授予所有从应用类路径加载的代码,从而使应用能够自行终止。另外,"exitVM "权限相当于 "exitVM.*"。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to register a malicious shutdown hook that interferes with the clean shutdown of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以注册一个恶意关机钩子,干扰虚拟机的清洁关机。

trans-unit.source: This allows an attacker to register a malicious uncaught exception handler that could interfere with termination of a thread
trans-unit.target: 这就允许攻击者注册一个恶意的未捕获异常处理程序,从而干扰线程的结束

trans-unit.source: This allows attackers to remove a certificate for an identity's public key. This is dangerous because it affects the trust relationship across the system. This public key suddenly becomes considered less trustworthy than it otherwise would be.
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以删除身份的公钥的证书。这很危险,因为它会影响整个系统的信任关系。这把公钥突然被认为比其他方式更不可信。

trans-unit.source: This allows attackers to set a certificate for an identity's public key. This is dangerous because it affects the trust relationship across the system. This public key suddenly becomes trusted to a wider audience than it otherwise would be.
trans-unit.target: 这允许攻击者为身份的公钥设置证书。这很危险,因为它会影响整个系统的信任关系。这个公钥突然变得比原来更受信任。

trans-unit.source: This allows attackers to set the general description for an identity. This may trick applications into using a different identity than intended or may prevent applications from finding a particular identity.
trans-unit.target: 这使得攻击者可以设置身份的一般描述。这可能会诱使应用程序使用与预期不同的身份,或阻止应用程序找到特定的身份。

trans-unit.source: This allows changing the value of the standard system streams. An attacker may change System.in to monitor and steal user input, or may set System.err to a "null" OutputStream, which would hide any error messages sent to System.err.
trans-unit.target: 这允许改变标准系统流的值。攻击者可以改变System.in来监视和窃取用户的输入,也可以将System.err设置为一个 "null "的OutputStream,这样就可以隐藏任何发送到System.err的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: This allows code to obtain file system information such as disk usage or disk space available to the caller. This is potentially dangerous because it discloses information about the system hardware configuration and some information about the caller's privilege to write files.
trans-unit.target: 这允许代码获取文件系统信息,如磁盘使用情况或调用者可用的磁盘空间。这具有潜在的危险性,因为它泄露了系统硬件配置的信息和调用者写文件的权限的一些信息。

trans-unit.source: This allows code to obtain policy information for a particular code source. While obtaining policy information does not compromise the security of the system, it does give attackers additional information, such as local file names for example, to better aim an attack.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码可以获取特定代码源的策略信息。虽然获取策略信息不会影响系统的安全性,但它确实给攻击者提供了额外的信息,例如本地文件名,以便更好地瞄准攻击。

trans-unit.source: This allows code to set the actual implementation for the socket, server socket, stream handler, or RMI socket factory. An attacker may set a faulty implementation which mangles the data stream.
trans-unit.target: 这允许代码设置套接字、服务器套接字、流处理程序或RMI套接字工厂的实际实现。攻击者可能会设置一个错误的实现,从而扰乱数据流。

trans-unit.source: This allows code to stop any thread in the system provided that it is already granted permission to access that thread. This poses as a threat, because that code may corrupt the system by killing existing threads.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码可以停止系统中的任何线程,但前提是它已经被授予访问该线程的权限。这构成了一种威胁,因为该代码可能会通过杀死现有线程来破坏系统。

trans-unit.source: This allows code to write to a particular file associated with the descriptor. This is dangerous because it may allow malicious code to plant viruses or at the very least, fill up your entire disk.
trans-unit.target: 这允许代码写入与描述符相关的特定文件。这是很危险的,因为它可能允许恶意代码植入病毒,或者至少填满你的整个磁盘。

trans-unit.source: This allows malicious code to monitor runtime information and uncover vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 这使得恶意代码可以监控运行时信息并发现漏洞。

trans-unit.source: This allows retrieval of Class objects from stack walking. This might allow malicious code to access Class objects on the stack outside its own context.
trans-unit.target: 这允许从堆栈行走中检索Class对象。这可能允许恶意代码在其自身上下文之外访问堆栈上的Class对象。

trans-unit.source: This allows retrieval of the stack trace information of another thread. This might allow malicious code to monitor the execution of threads and discover vulnerabilities in applications.
trans-unit.target: 这允许检索另一个线程的堆栈跟踪信息。这可能允许恶意代码监视线程的执行,并发现应用程序中的漏洞。

trans-unit.source: This allows someone to instantiate an AccessControlContext with a DomainCombiner. Extreme care must be taken when granting this permission. Malicious code could create a DomainCombiner that augments the set of permissions granted to code, and even grant the code AllPermission.
trans-unit.target: 这允许某人使用 DomainCombiner 实例化AccessControlContext 。授予此权限时，必须格外小心。恶意代码可能会创建DomainCombiner，从而扩大授予代码的权限集，甚至授予代码 AllPermission 。

trans-unit.source: This allows someone to query the policy via the getPermissions call, which discloses which permissions would be granted to a given CodeSource. While revealing the policy does not compromise the security of the system, it does provide malicious code with additional information which it may use to better aim an attack. It is wise not to divulge more information than necessary.
trans-unit.target: 这允许某人通过 getPermissions 调用查询该策略，该调用公开将授予给定CodeSource的权限。尽管揭示该策略不会损害系统的安全性，但它确实为恶意代码提供了附加信息，可用于更好地针对攻击。明智的做法是不要泄露过多的信息。

trans-unit.source: This allows someone to retrieve an AccessControlContext's DomainCombiner. Since DomainCombiners may contain sensitive information, this could potentially lead to a privacy leak.
trans-unit.target: 这允许某人检索AccessControlContext的 DomainCombiner 。由于DomainCombiners可能包含敏感信息，因此有可能导致隐私泄露。

trans-unit.source: This allows the epoch-second field to be converted to a local date-time. This is primarily intended for low-level conversions rather than general application usage.
trans-unit.target: 这允许将 epoch-second 字段转换为本地日期时间。这主要用于低级转换，而不是一般的应用程序使用。

trans-unit.source: This allows the model to be safely rendered in the presence of currency, if the model supports being updated asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型支持异步更新,这允许模型在有货币的情况下安全地呈现。

trans-unit.source: This allows the model to be safely rendered in the presence of currency, if the model supports being updated asynchronously. The given runnable will be executed in a way that allows it to safely read the model with no changes while the runnable is being executed. The runnable itself may not make any mutations.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型支持异步更新，则可以在存在货币的情况下安全地呈现模型。给定的runnable的执行方式将使其可以在执行runnable时安全地读取模型而无需进行任何更改。可运行的本身可能不会进行任何突变。

trans-unit.source: This allows the named provider to perform login and logout operations. The named provider must extend AuthProvider and care must be taken to grant to a trusted provider since login operations involve sensitive authentication information such as PINs and passwords.
trans-unit.target: 这允许命名的提供程序执行登录和注销操作。由于登录操作涉及敏感的身份验证信息（例如PIN和密码），因此指定的提供程序必须扩展 AuthProvider ,并且必须谨慎授予授予可信任的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This allows this date-time to be converted to a value of the epoch-seconds field. This is primarily intended for low-level conversions rather than general application usage.
trans-unit.target: 这允许将此日期时间转换为 epoch-seconds 字段的值。这主要用于低级转换，而不是一般的应用程序使用。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to use a RuleBasedCollator to compare accented strings even when the collator is set to NO_DECOMPOSITION. There are two caveats, however. First, if the strings to be collated contain combining sequences that may not be in canonical order, you should set the collator to CANONICAL_DECOMPOSITION or FULL_DECOMPOSITION to enable sorting of combining sequences. Second, if the strings contain characters with compatibility decompositions (such as full-width and half-width forms), you must use FULL_DECOMPOSITION, since the rule tables only include canonical mappings.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你使用 RuleBasedCollator 来比较重音字符串,即使 collator 被设置为 NO_DECOMPOSITION。但是,有两个注意事项。首先,如果要整理的字符串包含的组合序列可能不是按规范顺序排列的,你应该将整理器设置为CANONICAL_DECOMPOSITION或FULL_DECOMPOSITION,以实现组合序列的排序。其次,如果字符串包含具有兼容性分解的字符(如全宽和半宽形式),你必须使用FULL_DECOMPOSITION,因为规则表只包括规范映射。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to write programs that can:
trans-unit.target: 这让你可以编写程序,可以。

trans-unit.source: This also caches the minsizes for all the children when they are first encountered (so subsequent loops don't need to ask again).
trans-unit.target: 这也会在第一次遇到子代时缓存所有子代的minsizes(所以后续的循环不需要再问)。

trans-unit.source: This also sets the base of the StyleSheet to be u as well as the base of the document.
trans-unit.target: 这还将 StyleSheet 的基础设置为 u ，同时将文档的基础设置为u。

trans-unit.source: This amount of memory is not guaranteed to be available for memory management if it is greater than the amount of committed memory. The Java virtual machine may fail to allocate memory even if the amount of used memory does not exceed this maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个内存量大于已承诺的内存量,则不能保证内存管理可用。即使使用的内存量不超过这个最大容量,Java虚拟机也可能无法分配内存。

trans-unit.source: This annotation is inherited.
trans-unit.target: 这个注解是继承的。

trans-unit.source: This annotation type has a boolean-valued element forRemoval. A value of true indicates intent to remove the annotated program element in a future version. A value of false indicates that use of the annotated program element is discouraged, but at the time the program element was annotated, there was no specific intent to remove it.
trans-unit.target: 此注释类型具有一个用于 forRemoval 的布尔值元素。值为 true 表示打算在将来的版本中删除带注释的程序元素。值为 false 表示不鼓励使用带注释的程序元素，但是在对程序元素进行注释时，没有明确的意图将其删除。

trans-unit.source: This annotation type has a string-valued element since. The value of this element indicates the version in which the annotated program element was first deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 此注释类型有一个字符串值元素 since 。此元素的值指示已弃用带注释的program元素的版本。

trans-unit.source: This appends a localized section to the builder, suitable for outputting a date, time or date-time combination. The format of the localized section is lazily looked up based on four items:
trans-unit.target: 该功能将本地化部分附加到构建器中,适合输出日期、时间或日期-时间组合。本地化部分的格式是根据四项内容懒得查找的。

trans-unit.source: This appends a localized zone offset to the builder, the format of the localized offset is controlled by the specified style to this method:
trans-unit.target: 这会将本地化区域偏移量附加到构建器，该本地化偏移量的格式由此方法的指定 style 控制：

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the best available zone or offset ID to the builder. The zone ID is obtained in a lenient manner that first attempts to find a true zone ID, such as that on ZonedDateTime, and then attempts to find an offset, such as that on OffsetDateTime.
trans-unit.target: 这会向构建器追加一条指令，以格式化/解析最佳可用区域或偏移ID。以宽松的方式获得区域ID，首先尝试找到一个真实的区域ID，例如 ZonedDateTime 上的ID，然后尝试找到一个偏移量，例如 OffsetDateTime 上的偏移。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the chronology ID to the builder.
trans-unit.target: 这将为构建器附加一个格式化/解析年表ID的指令。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the generic textual name of the zone to the builder. The generic name is the same throughout the whole year, ignoring any daylight saving changes. For example, 'Pacific Time' is the generic name, whereas 'Pacific Standard Time' and 'Pacific Daylight Time' are the specific names, see appendZoneText(TextStyle).
trans-unit.target: 这将向构建器追加一条指令，以格式化/解析区域的通用文本名称。全年的通用名称相同，忽略了任何夏令时更改。例如，“太平洋时间”是通用名称，而“太平洋标准时间”和“太平洋夏令时间”是特定名称，请参见 appendZoneText(TextStyle) 。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the offset ID to the builder.
trans-unit.target: 该指令将格式化/解析偏移量ID的指令附加到生成器中。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the offset ID to the builder. This is equivalent to calling appendOffset("+HH:MM:ss", "Z").
trans-unit.target: 这会向构建器追加一条指令，以格式化/解析偏移量ID。这等效于调用 appendOffset("+HH:MM:ss", "Z") 。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the offset ID to the builder. This is equivalent to calling appendOffset("+HH:mm:ss", "Z"). See appendOffset(String, String) for details on formatting and parsing.
trans-unit.target: 这将向构建器追加一条指令，以格式化/解析偏移量ID。这等效于调用 appendOffset("+HH:mm:ss", "Z") 。有关格式化和解析的详细信息 appendOffset(String, String) 请参见appendOffset（String，String）。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the textual name of the zone to the builder.
trans-unit.target: 这将向生成器附加一条指令,用于格式化/解析区域的文本名称。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the zone ID to the builder only if it is a region-based ID.
trans-unit.target: 只有当区段 ID 是基于区域的 ID 时,该指令才会向生成器附加格式化/解析区段 ID 的指令。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the zone ID to the builder. The zone ID is obtained in a strict manner suitable for ZonedDateTime. By contrast, OffsetDateTime does not have a zone ID suitable for use with this method, see appendZoneOrOffsetId().
trans-unit.target: 这将向构建器追加一条指令，以格式化/解析区域ID。严格按照适用于 ZonedDateTime 的方式获取区域ID 。相比之下， OffsetDateTime 没有适合此方法使用的区域ID，请参见 appendZoneOrOffsetId() 。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to format/parse the zone ID to the builder. The zone ID is obtained in a strict manner suitable for ZonedDateTime. By contrast, OffsetDateTime does not have a zone ID suitable for use with this method, see appendZoneOrOffsetId().
trans-unit.target: 这将向构建器追加一条指令以格式化/解析区域ID。严格按照适用于 ZonedDateTime 的方式获取区域ID 。相比之下， OffsetDateTime 没有适合此方法使用的区域ID，请参见 appendZoneOrOffsetId() 。

trans-unit.source: This appends an instruction to the builder to inject a default value into the parsed result. This is especially useful in conjunction with optional parts of the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 这将为构建器添加一条指令,使其在解析结果中注入一个默认值。这在与格式器的可选部分结合使用时特别有用。

trans-unit.source: This applies the conversions listed in Locale.forLanguageTag(java.lang.String) when constructing a Locale. (Grandfathered tags are handled in setLanguageTag(java.lang.String).)
trans-unit.target: 构造语言环境时，这将应用 Locale.forLanguageTag(java.lang.String) 中列出的转换。（祖父标记在 setLanguageTag(java.lang.String) 中处理。）

trans-unit.source: This applies the conversions listed in Locale.forLanguageTag(java.lang.String) when constructing a Locale. (Grandfathered tags are handled in setLanguageTag(java.lang.String).)
trans-unit.target: 构造语言环境时，这将应用 Locale.forLanguageTag(java.lang.String) 中列出的转换。（祖父标记在 setLanguageTag(java.lang.String) 中处理。）

trans-unit.source: This approach allows an alternate clock, such as fixed or offset to be used during testing.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法允许在测试过程中使用备用时钟，例如 fixed 时钟或 offset 时钟。

trans-unit.source: This approach allows an alternate clock, such as fixed or offset to be used during testing.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法允许在测试过程中使用备用时钟，例如 fixed 时钟或 offset 时钟。

trans-unit.source: This approach can cause slower times than the backing store approach when the viewport is obscured by another window, or partially offscreen. When another window obscures the viewport the copyArea will copy garbage and a paint event will be generated by the system to inform us we need to paint the newly exposed region. The only way to handle this is to repaint the whole viewport, which can cause slower performance than the backing store case. In most applications very rarely will the user be scrolling while the viewport is obscured by another window or offscreen, so this optimization is usually worth the performance hit when obscured.
trans-unit.target: 当视口被另一个窗口遮挡,或者部分离屏时,这种方法会造成比后置存储的方法慢。当另一个窗口遮挡住视口时,copyArea会复制垃圾,系统会产生一个paint事件,通知我们需要绘制新暴露的区域。处理这种情况的唯一方法是重新绘制整个视口,这可能会导致性能比后置存储情况更慢。在大多数应用中,用户很少会在滚动时视口被另一个窗口或屏幕外的窗口遮挡,所以这种优化通常值得在遮挡时对性能的影响。

trans-unit.source: This approach ensures that a partial period can be added to a partial date. For example, a period of years and/or months can be added to a YearMonth, but a period including days cannot. The approach also adds years and months together when necessary, which ensures correct behaviour at the end of the month.
trans-unit.target: 此方法确保可以将部分期间添加到部分日期。例如，可以将 YearMonth 和/或months的时间段添加到YearMonth，但是不能包含Days的时间段。该方法还可以在必要时将年月累加在一起，以确保在月底时有正确的行为。

trans-unit.source: This approach ensures that a partial period can be subtracted from a partial date. For example, a period of years and/or months can be subtracted from a YearMonth, but a period including days cannot. The approach also subtracts years and months together when necessary, which ensures correct behaviour at the end of the month.
trans-unit.target: 此方法确保可以从部分日期中减去部分时间。例如，可以从 YearMonth 中减去几年和/或几个月的时间，但是不能包括天的时间。该方法还会在必要时一起减去数年和数月，以确保在月底时进行正确的操作。

trans-unit.source: This approach has the advantage that the party who unseals the object does not need to keep track of the parameters (e.g., an IV) that were used to seal the object.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法的优点是,解封对象的一方不需要跟踪用于封存对象的参数(如IV)。

trans-unit.source: This approach has the advantage that the party who unseals the sealed object does not require knowledge of the decryption key. For example, after one party has initialized the cipher object with the required decryption key, it could hand over the cipher object to another party who then unseals the sealed object.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法的优点是,解封封存对象的一方不需要知道解密钥匙。例如,在一方用所需的解密钥匙初始化了加密对象之后,它可以将加密对象交给另一方,然后由另一方解封密封对象。

trans-unit.source: This approach treats the problem of globalized calendar systems as a localization issue and confines it to the UI layer. This approach is in keeping with other localization issues in the java platform.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法将全球化日历系统的问题作为一个本地化问题来处理,并将其限制在UI层。这种方法与java平台的其他本地化问题一致。

trans-unit.source: This assertion applies in exactly the same manner when column names are used rather than column indexes to indicate match columns.
trans-unit.target: 当使用列名而不是列索引来表示匹配列时,这个断言的适用方式完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This assumes that path is valid and visible.
trans-unit.target: 假设路径有效且可见。

trans-unit.source: This attempts to validate the view before scrolling if the view is currently not valid - isValid returns false. To avoid excessive validation when the containment hierarchy is being created this will not validate if one of the ancestors does not have a peer, or there is no validate root ancestor, or one of the ancestors is not a Window or Applet.
trans-unit.target: 如果视图当前无效，这将尝试在滚动之前验证视图 isValid 返回false。为了避免在创建包含层次结构时进行过多的验证，如果其中一个祖先没有对等项，或者没有验证的根祖先，或者其中一个祖先不是 Window 或 Applet ,这将不会进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used instead of specifying MediaName or MediaTray.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性代替指定 MediaName 或 MediaTray 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used instead of specifying MediaSize or MediaTray.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性代替指定 MediaSize 或 MediaTray 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used instead of specifying MediaName or MediaTray.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于代替指定MediaName或MediaTray。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used instead of specifying MediaSize or MediaTray.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于代替指定MediaSize或MediaTray。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines a pattern from which to create a ObjectInputFilter that will be used when deserializing objects sent to the JMXConnectorServer by any client.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一种模式，从该模式可以创建一个 ObjectInputFilter ，该序列将在反序列化任何客户端发送给 JMXConnectorServer 的对象时使用。

trans-unit.source: This attribute determines which node types are presented via the NodeIterator.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定通过 NodeIterator 呈现哪些节点类型。

trans-unit.source: This attribute determines which node types are presented via the NodeIterator. The available set of constants is defined in the NodeFilter interface. Nodes not accepted by whatToShow will be skipped, but their children may still be considered. Note that this skip takes precedence over the filter, if any.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定通过 NodeIterator 呈现哪些节点类型。可用的常量集在 NodeFilter 接口中定义。 whatToShow 不接受的节点将被跳过，但仍可以考虑其子节点。请注意，此跳过优先于过滤器（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This attribute determines which node types are presented via the TreeWalker.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定通过 TreeWalker 呈现哪些节点类型。

trans-unit.source: This attribute determines which node types are presented via the TreeWalker. The available set of constants is defined in the NodeFilter interface. Nodes not accepted by whatToShow will be skipped, but their children may still be considered. Note that this skip takes precedence over the filter, if any.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定通过 TreeWalker 呈现哪些节点类型。可用的常量集在 NodeFilter 接口中定义。 whatToShow 不接受的节点将被跳过，但仍可以考虑其子节点。请注意，此跳过优先于过滤器（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This attribute has no effect when the application provides a character stream or string data. For other sources of input, an encoding specified by means of this attribute will override any encoding specified in the XML declaration or the Text declaration, or an encoding obtained from a higher level protocol, such as HTTP [IETF RFC 2616].
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序提供字符流或字符串数​​据时，此属性无效。对于其他输入源，通过此属性指定的编码将覆盖XML声明或Text声明中指定的任何编码，或者从高级协议（例如HTTP [ IETF RFC 2616 ]）获得的编码。

trans-unit.source: This attribute has no effect when the application provides a character stream or string data. For other sources of input, an encoding specified by means of this attribute will override any encoding specified in the XML declaration or the Text declaration, or an encoding obtained from a higher level protocol, such as HTTP [IETF RFC 2616].
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序提供字符流或字符串数​​据时，此属性无效。对于其他输入源，通过此属性指定的编码将覆盖XML声明或Text声明中指定的任何编码，或者从高级协议（例如HTTP [ IETF RFC 2616 ]）获得的编码。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates that any upcoming changes to the value of the model should be considered a single event.
trans-unit.target: 该属性表明,模型值的任何即将发生的变化都应被视为单一事件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates that any upcoming changes to the value of the model should be considered a single event. This attribute will be set to true at the start of a series of changes to the value, and will be set to false when the value has finished changing. Normally this allows a listener to only take action when the final value change in committed, instead of having to do updates for all intermediate values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示任何即将对模型的值进行的更改都应被视为单一事件。该属性将在值的一系列变化开始时设置为真,当值完成变化时将设置为假。通常,这允许监听器只在最终的值变化提交时才采取行动,而不必为所有中间值进行更新。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is often used as a simple access control mechanism to prevent files from being deleted or updated. Whether the file system or platform does any enforcement to prevent read-only files from being updated is implementation specific.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用作简单的访问控制机制，以防止文件被删除或更新。文件系统或平台是否执行任何强制措施以防止只读文件被更新是特定于实现的。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is often used to indicate if the file is visible to users.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性通常用于指示文件是否对用户可见。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is often used to indicate that the file is a component of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性通常用来表示文件是操作系统的一个组件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is typically used by backup programs.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常由备份程序使用。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to reserve space for a graphic or other component embedded in a line of text. It is required for correct positioning of 'inline' components within a line when bidirectional reordering (see Bidi) is performed. Each character (Unicode code point) will be rendered using the provided GraphicAttribute. Typically, the characters to which this attribute is applied should be \uFFFC.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于为嵌入一行文本的图形或其他组件保留空间。在执行双向重新排序（请参阅 Bidi ）时，需要在行内正确放置“行内”组件。每个字符（Unicode代码点）将使用提供的GraphicAttribute呈现。通常，应用此属性的字符应为 \uFFFC 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute links this label with another form control by id attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通过 id 属性将此标签与另一个表单控件链接。

trans-unit.source: This attribute links this label with another form control by id attribute. See the for attribute definition in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通过 id 属性将此标签与另一个表单控件链接。请参阅HTML 4.0中的for属性定义。

trans-unit.source: This attribute returns the text content of this node and its descendants.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回此节点及其子节点的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This attribute returns the text content of this node and its descendants. When it is defined to be null, setting it has no effect. On setting, any possible children this node may have are removed and, if it the new string is not empty or null, replaced by a single Text node containing the string this attribute is set to.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回此节点及其后代的文本内容。如果将其定义为 null ，则设置无效。设置时，将删除此节点可能具有的所有可能子节点，如果新字符串不为空或为 null ，则将其替换为包含此属性设置为字符串的单个 Text 节点。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the .ser file that contains a serialized representation of the MBean to be obtained. This file must be contained in one of the .jar files specified by the ARCHIVE attribute. If the .jar file contains a directory hierarchy, specify the path of the file within this hierarchy. Otherwise a match will not be found. Either CODE or OBJECT must be present.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定 .ser 文件，该文件包含要获取的MBean的序列化表示形式。此文件必须包含在 ARCHIVE 属性指定的 .jar 文件之一中。如果 .jar 文件包含目录层次结构，请在此层次结构中指定文件的路径。否则将找不到匹配项。要么 CODE 或 OBJECT 必须存在。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the full Java class name, including package name, of the MBean to be obtained. The compiled .class file of the MBean must be contained in one of the .jar files specified by the ARCHIVE attribute. Either CODE or OBJECT must be present.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定要获取的MBean的完整Java类名称，包括程序包名称。MBean 的已编译 .class 文件必须包含在 ARCHIVE 属性指定的 .jar 文件之一中。要么 CODE 或 OBJECT 必须存在。

trans-unit.source: This base class returns an empty string, but this may be overridden by subclasses.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can also be enabled by setting the System Property "java.awt.Window.locationByPlatform" to "true", though calls to this method take precedence.
trans-unit.target: 这种行为也可以通过设置系统属性 "java.awt.Window.locationByPlatform "为 "true "来启用,尽管对该方法的调用优先。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to support debugging and to be compatible with previous uses of toString that expected language, country, and variant fields only. To represent a Locale as a String for interchange purposes, use toLanguageTag().
trans-unit.target: 此行为旨在支持调试并与 toString 的先前用法兼容，后者仅用于预期的语言，国家和地区字段。出于交换目的，将语言环境表示为String，请使用 toLanguageTag() 。

trans-unit.source: This boolean indicates whether or not it is acceptable to apply the color filtering of the filterRGB method to the color table entries of an IndexColorModel object in lieu of pixel by pixel filtering.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔值表示是否可以将filterRGB方法的颜色过滤应用于IndexColorModel对象的颜色表项,以代替逐像素过滤。

trans-unit.source: This boolean indicates whether or not it is acceptable to apply the color filtering of the filterRGB method to the color table entries of an IndexColorModel object in lieu of pixel by pixel filtering. Subclasses should set this variable to true in their constructor if their filterRGB method does not depend on the coordinate of the pixel being filtered.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔值表示是否可以将filterRGB方法的颜色过滤应用到IndexColorModel对象的颜色表项上,以代替逐个像素过滤。如果子类的filterRGB方法不依赖于被过滤像素的坐标,那么子类应该在其构造函数中把这个变量设置为true。

trans-unit.source: This builder.

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount in terms of this unit. The start and end points are supplied as temporal objects and must be of compatible types. The implementation will convert the second type to be an instance of the first type before the calculating the amount. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. For example, the amount in hours between two temporal objects can be calculated using HOURS.between(startTime, endTime).
trans-unit.target: 这将以该单位计算金额。起点和终点作为时间对象提供，并且必须具有兼容的类型。在计算金额之前，该实现将把第二种类型转换为第一种类型的实例。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。例如，可以使用 HOURS.between(startTime, endTime) 计算两个时间对象之间的小时数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two ChronoLocalDate objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified date. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a ChronoLocalDate using Chronology.date(TemporalAccessor). The calculation returns a whole number, representing the number of complete units between the two dates. For example, the amount in days between two dates can be calculated using startDate.until(endDate, DAYS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 ChronoLocalDate 对象之间的时间。起点和终点是 this 日期和指定的日期。如果结束在开始之前，结果将为负。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 Chronology.date(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 ChronoLocalDate 。计算返回一个整数，代表两个日期之间的完整单位数。例如，可以使用 startDate.until(endDate, DAYS) 计算两个日期之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two ChronoLocalDate objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified date. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a ChronoLocalDate using Chronology.date(TemporalAccessor). The calculation returns a whole number, representing the number of complete units between the two dates. For example, the amount in days between two dates can be calculated using startDate.until(endDate, DAYS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 ChronoLocalDate 对象之间的时间。起点和终点是 this 日期和指定的日期。如果结束在开始之前，结果将为负。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 Chronology.date(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 ChronoLocalDate 。计算返回一个整数，代表两个日期之间的完整单位数。例如，可以使用 startDate.until(endDate, DAYS) 计算两个日期之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two Instant objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified instant. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The calculation returns a whole number, representing the number of complete units between the two instants. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a Instant using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in seconds between two dates can be calculated using startInstant.until(endInstant, SECONDS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 Instant 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 时刻和指定的瞬间。如果结束在开始之前，结果将为负。计算返回一个整数，代表两个时刻之间的完整单位数。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 Instant 。例如，可以使用 startInstant.until(endInstant, SECONDS) 计算两个日期之间的秒数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two Instant objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified instant. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The calculation returns a whole number, representing the number of complete units between the two instants. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a Instant using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in days between two dates can be calculated using startInstant.until(endInstant, SECONDS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 Instant 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 点和指定的瞬间。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。计算返回一个整数，代表两个时刻之间的完整单位数。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 Instant 。例如，可以使用 startInstant.until(endInstant, SECONDS) 计算两个日期之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two LocalDate objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified date. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a LocalDate using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in days between two dates can be calculated using startDate.until(endDate, DAYS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 LocalDate 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 日期和指定的日期。如果结束在开始之前，结果将为负。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 LocalDate 。例如，可以使用 startDate.until(endDate, DAYS) 计算两个日期之间的天数。

The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a LocalDateTime using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in days between two date-times can be calculated using startDateTime.until(endDateTime, DAYS).

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two LocalTime objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified time. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. For example, the amount in days between two date-times can be calculated using startDateTime.until(endDateTime, DAYS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 OffsetDateTime 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 日期和指定的日期时间。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。例如，可以使用 startDateTime.until(endDateTime, DAYS) 计算两个日期时间之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two OffsetTime objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified time. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. For example, the amount in hours between two times can be calculated using startTime.until(endTime, HOURS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 OffsetTime 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 时间和指定的时间。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。例如，可以使用 startTime.until(endTime, HOURS) 计算两次之间的小时数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two Year objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified year. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a Year using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in decades between two year can be calculated using startYear.until(endYear, DECADES).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 Year 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 和指定的年份。如果结束在开始之前，结果将为负。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 Year 。例如，可以使用 startYear.until(endYear, DECADES) 计算两年之间数十年的金额。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two Year objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified year. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a Year using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in decades between two year can be calculated using startYear.until(endYear, DECADES).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 Year 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 和指定的年份。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。传递给此方法的 Temporal 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 转换为 Year 。例如，可以使用 startYear.until(endYear, DECADES) 计算两年之间数十年的金额。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two YearMonth objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified year-month. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a YearMonth using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in years between two year-months can be calculated using startYearMonth.until(endYearMonth, YEARS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 YearMonth 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点分别是 this 年份和指定的年月日。如果结束在开始之前，结果将为负。的 Temporal 传递给此方法被转换为 YearMonth 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 。例如，可以使用 startYearMonth.until(endYearMonth, YEARS) 计算两个年份-月份之间的年数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two YearMonth objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified year-month. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The Temporal passed to this method is converted to a YearMonth using from(TemporalAccessor). For example, the amount in years between two year-months can be calculated using startYearMonth.until(endYearMonth, YEARS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 YearMonth 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点分别是 this 和指定的年份-月份。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。的 Temporal 传递给此方法被转换为 YearMonth 使用 from(TemporalAccessor) 。例如，可以使用 startYearMonth.until(endYearMonth, YEARS) 计算两个年份-月份之间的年数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two ZonedDateTime objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified date-time. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. For example, the amount in days between two date-times can be calculated using startDateTime.until(endDateTime, DAYS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个 ZonedDateTime 对象之间的时间量。起点和终点是 this 日期和指定的日期时间。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。例如，可以使用 startDateTime.until(endDateTime, DAYS) 计算两个日期时间之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the amount of time between two temporal objects in terms of a single TemporalUnit. The start and end points are this and the specified temporal. The end point is converted to be of the same type as the start point if different. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. For example, the amount in hours between two temporal objects can be calculated using startTime.until(endTime, HOURS).
trans-unit.target: 这将根据单个 TemporalUnit 计算两个时间对象之间的时间。起点和终点是 this 点和指定的时间点。终点将转换为与起点相同的类型（如果不同）。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。例如，可以使用 startTime.until(endTime, HOURS) 计算两个时间对象之间的小时数。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the duration between two temporal objects. If the objects are of different types, then the duration is calculated based on the type of the first object. For example, if the first argument is a LocalTime then the second argument is converted to a LocalTime.
trans-unit.target: 这将计算两个时间对象之间的持续时间。如果对象是不同类型的，则根据第一个对象的类型来计算持续时间。例如，如果第一个参数是 LocalTime ,则第二个参数将转换为 LocalTime 。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the period between two dates in terms of years, months and days. The start and end points are this and the specified date. The result will be negative if the end is before the start. The negative sign will be the same in each of year, month and day.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据年，月和日来计算两个日期之间的时间段。起点和终点是 this 日期和指定的日期。如果结束早于开始，则结果将为负。负号在每年，每月和每天中都相同。

trans-unit.source: This calculates the period between two dates. All supplied chronologies calculate the period using years, months and days, however the ChronoPeriod API allows the period to be represented using other units.
trans-unit.target: 这将计算两个日期之间的时间段。所有提供的时间顺序都使用年，月和日来计算时间段，但是 ChronoPeriod API允许使用其他单位来表示时间段。

trans-unit.source: This call is intended for use by applications that communicate over protocols that impose a maximum message size. It enables the application to fragment messages prior to applying protection.
trans-unit.target: 此调用供通过规定最大消息大小的协议进行通信的应用程序使用。它使应用程序能够在应用保护之前对信息进行分割。

trans-unit.source: This call is provided for backward compatibility. It is routed to a call to setCaretPosition followed by a call to moveCaretPosition. The preferred way to manage selection is by calling those methods directly.
trans-unit.target: 提供此调用是为了向后兼容。它被路由到 setCaretPosition 的调用，然后是 moveCaretPosition 的调用。管理选择的首选方法是直接调用这些方法。

trans-unit.source: This call is typically used to increase the scale, in which case it is guaranteed that there exists a BigDecimal of the specified scale and the correct value. The call can also be used to reduce the scale if the caller knows that the BigDecimal has sufficiently many zeros at the end of its fractional part (i.e., factors of ten in its integer value) to allow for the rescaling without changing its value.
trans-unit.target: 此调用通常用于增加小数位数，在这种情况下，可以确保存在指定小数 BigDecimal 和正确值的BigDecimal。如果调用者知道 BigDecimal 在其小数部分的末尾具有足够多的零（即，其整数值是10的因数）以允许在不更改其值的情况下进行重新缩放，则该调用还可用于减小比例。

trans-unit.source: This call takes into account any unprocessed (buffered) data from a previous update call, padding, and AEAD tagging.
trans-unit.target: 该调用考虑了来自先前 update 调用，填充和AEAD标记的所有未处理（缓冲）数据。

trans-unit.source: This callback is used by SaslClient and SaslServer to obtain a realm given a list of realm choices.
trans-unit.target: SaslClient 和 SaslServer 使用此回调来获取给定领域选择列表的领域。

trans-unit.source: This callback is used by SaslClient and SaslServer to retrieve realm information.
trans-unit.target: SaslClient 和 SaslServer 使用此回调来检索领域信息。

trans-unit.source: This callback is used by SaslServer to determine whether one entity (identified by an authenticated authentication id) can act on behalf of another entity (identified by an authorization id).
trans-unit.target: SaslServer 使用此回调来确定一个实体（由经过身份验证的身份验证ID标识）是否可以代表另一实体（由授权ID标识）行动。

trans-unit.source: This callback will be used for comments inside or outside the document element, including comments in the external DTD subset (if read). Comments in the DTD must be properly nested inside start/endDTD and start/endEntity events (if used).
trans-unit.target: 这个回调将用于文档元素内部或外部的注释,包括外部DTD子集中的注释(如果读取)。DTD中的注释必须正确地嵌套在start/endDTD和start/endEntity事件中(如果使用)。

trans-unit.target: 当在逻辑父元素层次结构中的多个 XMLConstants.XMLNS_ATTRIBUTE （“ xmlns”）命名空间声明中使用相同的命名空间URI时，也会发生这种情况。例如

trans-unit.source: This can be used multiple times to force any number of components to share the same size.
trans-unit.target: 这可以多次使用,强制任何数量的组件共享相同的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to select between two or more ways that a date or time might be resolved. For example, if the formatter consists of year, month, day-of-month and day-of-year, then there are two ways to resolve a date. Calling this method with the arguments YEAR and DAY_OF_YEAR will ensure that the date is resolved using the year and day-of-year, effectively meaning that the month and day-of-month are ignored during the resolving phase.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于在两种或多种可能解决日期或时间的方式之间进行选择。例如，如果格式化程序由年，月，日和年组成，则有两种方法来解析日期。使用参数 YEAR 和 DAY_OF_YEAR 调用此方法将确保使用年份和年份来解析日期，有效地意味着在解析阶段将忽略月份和月份。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to, for example, control terminal functions like a built-in PIN pad or biometrics.
trans-unit.target: 例如,这可以用来控制终端功能,如内置PIN垫或生物识别。

trans-unit.source: This can marginally decrease the transmitted size of the archive, at the expense of setting all installed files to a single date.
trans-unit.target: 这可以略微减少传输的存档大小,但代价是将所有安装的文件设置为单一日期。

trans-unit.source: This checks if this year can be queried for the specified field. If false, then calling the range, get and with(TemporalField, long) methods will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查是否可以查询今年的指定字段。如果为false，则调用 range ， get 和 with(TemporalField, long) 方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This checks if this year-month can be queried for the specified field. If false, then calling the range, get and with(TemporalField, long) methods will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这检查是否可以查询指定年份的年月。如果为false，则调用 range ， get 和 with(TemporalField, long) 方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This checks if this year-month can be queried for the specified field. If false, then calling the range, get and with(TemporalField, long) methods will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这检查是否可以查询指定年份的年月。如果为false，则调用 range ， get 和 with(TemporalField, long) 方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This checks that all valid values are within the bounds of an int.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查所有有效值是否在 int 的范围内。

trans-unit.source: This checks that the implementing date-time can add/subtract this unit. This can be used to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这检查实现的日期-时间是否可以加/减这个单位。这可以用来避免抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: This checks that the value is within the stored range of values.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查该值是否在存储的值范围内。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if the given offset will be valid at some point in the transition. A gap will always return false. An overlap will return true if the offset is either the before or after offset.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查给定的偏移量在过渡期的某一点是否有效。缺口将总是返回false。如果偏移量是之前或之后的偏移量,重叠将返回true。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if this date represents a point on the local time-line after the other date.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查这个日期是否代表当地时间线上另一个日期之后的一个点。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if this date represents a point on the local time-line before the other date.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查这个日期是否代表当地时间线上另一个日期之前的一个点。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if this date represents the same point on the local time-line as the other date.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查这个日期是否与另一个日期在本地时间线上代表同一个点。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if this date-time represents a point on the local time-line after the other date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查这个日期-时间是否代表本地时间线上的一个点,在另一个日期-时间之后。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if this date-time represents a point on the local time-line before the other date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查这个日期-时间是否代表本地时间线上的一个点,在另一个日期-时间之前。

trans-unit.source: This checks to see if this date-time represents the same point on the local time-line as the other date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查这个日期-时间是否与另一个日期-时间在本地时间线上代表同一个点。

trans-unit.source: This checks whether the years, months or days units are less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 检查年、月、日单位是否小于零。

trans-unit.source: This chronology defines the rules of the ISO calendar system. This calendar system is based on the ISO-8601 standard, which is the
trans-unit.target: 本年表规定了ISO日历系统的规则。这个日历系统是以ISO-8601标准为基础的,它就是

trans-unit.source: This chronology defines the rules of the Japanese Imperial calendar system. This calendar system is primarily used in Japan. The Japanese Imperial calendar system is the same as the ISO calendar system apart from the era-based year numbering.
trans-unit.target: 这个年表规定了日本皇室历法的规则。这种历法主要在日本使用。日本皇室历法与国际标准化组织的历法相同,只是年号以年代为基础。

trans-unit.source: This chronology defines the rules of the Minguo calendar system. This calendar system is primarily used in the Republic of China, often known as Taiwan. Dates are aligned such that 0001-01-01 (Minguo) is 1912-01-01 (ISO).
trans-unit.target: 此年表定义了Minguo日历系统的规则。此日历系统主要在中华民国（通常称为台湾）中使用。对齐日期以使 0001-01-01 (Minguo) 1912-01-01 (ISO) ）为1912-01-01（ISO）。

trans-unit.source: This chronology defines the rules of the Thai Buddhist calendar system. This calendar system is primarily used in Thailand. Dates are aligned such that 2484-01-01 (Buddhist) is 1941-01-01 (ISO).
trans-unit.target: 此年表定义了泰国佛教日历系统的规则。该日历系统主要在泰国使用。对齐日期以使 2484-01-01 (Buddhist) 为 1941-01-01 (ISO) 。

trans-unit.source: This class abstracts an NT security token and provides a mechanism to do same-process security impersonation.
trans-unit.target: 该类抽象了一个NT安全令牌,并提供了一个同进程安全冒充的机制。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a factory for key managers based on a source of key material.
trans-unit.target: 本班根据关键材料的来源,作为关键管理人员的工厂。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a factory for key managers based on a source of key material. Each key manager manages a specific type of key material for use by secure sockets. The key material is based on a KeyStore and/or provider specific sources.
trans-unit.target: 这个类作为基于密钥材料来源的密钥管理器的工厂。每个密钥管理器都管理特定类型的密钥材料,供安全套接字使用。密钥材料是基于KeyStore和/或提供者的特定来源。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a factory for trust managers based on a source of trust material.
trans-unit.target: 该类作为信托经理的工厂,基于信托材料的来源。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a factory for trust managers based on a source of trust material. Each trust manager manages a specific type of trust material for use by secure sockets. The trust material is based on a KeyStore and/or provider specific sources.
trans-unit.target: 这个类作为基于信任材料来源的信任管理器的工厂。每个信任管理器都管理一种特定类型的信任材料,供安全套接字使用。信任材料是基于KeyStore和/或提供者的特定来源。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a factory for trust managers based on a source of trust material. Each trust manager manages a specific type of trust material for use by secure sockets. The trust material is based on a KeyStore and/or provider-specific sources.
trans-unit.target: 这个类作为基于信任材料来源的信任管理器的工厂。每个信任管理器都管理一种特定类型的信任材料,供安全套接字使用。信任材料是基于KeyStore和/或特定提供者的来源。

trans-unit.source: This class adds the ability to set JPEG quantization and Huffman tables when using the built-in JPEG reader plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 当使用内置的JPEG阅读器插件时,该类增加了设置JPEG量化和Huffman表的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class adds the ability to set JPEG quantization and Huffman tables when using the built-in JPEG reader plug-in. An instance of this class will be returned from the getDefaultImageReadParam methods of the built-in JPEG ImageReader.
trans-unit.target: 使用内置的JPEG阅读器插件时，此类增加了设置JPEG量化表和Huffman表的功能。此类的实例将从内置的JPEG ImageReader 的 getDefaultImageReadParam 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: This class adds the ability to set JPEG quantization and Huffman tables when using the built-in JPEG writer plug-in, and to request that optimized Huffman tables be computed for an image.
trans-unit.target: 当使用内置的JPEG writer插件时,该类增加了设置JPEG量化和Huffman表的能力,并要求为图像计算优化的Huffman表。

trans-unit.source: This class adds the ability to set JPEG quantization and Huffman tables when using the built-in JPEG writer plug-in, and to request that optimized Huffman tables be computed for an image. An instance of this class will be returned from the getDefaultImageWriteParam methods of the built-in JPEG ImageWriter.
trans-unit.target: 此类增加了使用内置的JPEG writer插件时设置JPEG量化表和Huffman表的能力，并要求为图像计算优化的Huffman表。此类的实例将从内置的JPEG ImageWriter 的 getDefaultImageWriteParam 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: This class adheres strictly to the semantics, especially the failure semantics, of its ancestor classes java.io.FilterInputStream and java.io.InputStream. This class has exactly those methods specified in its ancestor classes, and overrides them all. Moreover, this class catches all exceptions that are not thrown by its ancestor classes. In particular, the skip method skips, and the available method counts only data that have been processed by the encapsulated Cipher.
trans-unit.target: 此类严格遵循其祖先类java.io.FilterInputStream和java.io.InputStream的语义，尤其是失败语义。此类完全具有其祖先类中指定的那些方法，并覆盖所有这些方法。此外，此类捕获其祖先类未抛出的所有异常。尤其是， skip 方法将跳过，并且 available 方法仅对已由封装的密码器处理过的数据进行计数。

trans-unit.source: This class adheres strictly to the semantics, especially the failure semantics, of its ancestor classes java.io.FilterInputStream and java.io.InputStream. This class has exactly those methods specified in its ancestor classes, and overrides them all. Moreover, this class catches all exceptions that are not thrown by its ancestor classes. In particular, the skip method skips, and the available method counts only data that have been processed by the encapsulated Cipher. This class may catch BadPaddingException and other exceptions thrown by failed integrity checks during decryption. These exceptions are not re-thrown, so the client may not be informed that integrity checks failed. Because of this behavior, this class may not be suitable for use with decryption in an authenticated mode of operation (e.g. GCM). Applications that require authenticated encryption can use the Cipher API directly as an alternative to using this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类严格遵守其祖先类java.io.FilterInputStream和java.io.InputStream的语义，尤其是失败语义。此类完全具有其祖先类中指定的那些方法，并覆盖所有这些方法。而且，此类捕获其祖先类未抛出的所有异常。特别是， skip 方法会跳过，并且 available 方法仅计算封装的Cipher处理过的数据。此类可能会捕获BadPaddingException以及解密过程中完整性检查失败而引发的其他异常。这些异常不会重新抛出，因此可能不会通知客户端完整性检查失败。由于这种行为，该类可能不适合在经过身份验证的操作模式（例如GCM）中与解密一起使用。需要身份验证加密的应用程序可以直接使用Cipher API作为使用此类的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: This class adheres strictly to the semantics, especially the failure semantics, of its ancestor classes java.io.OutputStream and java.io.FilterOutputStream. This class has exactly those methods specified in its ancestor classes, and overrides them all. Moreover, this class catches all exceptions that are not thrown by its ancestor classes.
trans-unit.target: 该类严格遵守其祖先类java.io.OutputStream和java.io.FilterOutputStream的语义,尤其是失败语义。这个类拥有它的祖先类中所指定的方法,并且覆盖了所有这些方法。此外,这个类还能捕获所有它的祖先类没有抛出的异常。

trans-unit.source: This class adheres strictly to the semantics, especially the failure semantics, of its ancestor classes java.io.OutputStream and java.io.FilterOutputStream. This class has exactly those methods specified in its ancestor classes, and overrides them all. Moreover, this class catches all exceptions that are not thrown by its ancestor classes. In particular, this class catches BadPaddingException and other exceptions thrown by failed integrity checks during decryption. These exceptions are not re-thrown, so the client will not be informed that integrity checks failed. Because of this behavior, this class may not be suitable for use with decryption in an authenticated mode of operation (e.g. GCM) if the application requires explicit notification when authentication fails. Such an application can use the Cipher API directly as an alternative to using this class.
trans-unit.target: 该类严格遵守其祖先类java.io.OutputStream和java.io.FilterOutputStream的语义,尤其是失败语义。这个类拥有它的祖先类中所指定的方法,并且覆盖了所有这些方法。此外,这个类还捕获了所有它的祖先类没有抛出的异常。特别是,这个类在解密过程中捕获了BadPaddingException和其他完整性检查失败所抛出的异常。这些异常不会被重新抛出,所以客户端不会被告知完整性检查失败。由于该行为,如果应用程序需要在验证失败时发出显式通知,那么该类可能不适合与验证操作模式(例如 GCM)中的解密一起使用。这样的应用可以直接使用Cipher API作为使用该类的替代方案。

trans-unit.source: This class allows a SAX application to encapsulate information about an input source in a single object, which may include a public identifier, a system identifier, a byte stream (possibly with a specified encoding), and/or a character stream.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许SAX应用程序将输入源的信息封装在一个对象中,该对象可能包括公共标识符、系统标识符、字节流(可能带有指定的编码)和/或字符流。

trans-unit.source: This class allows an application to create an input stream in which the bytes read are supplied by the contents of a string. Applications can also read bytes from a byte array by using a ByteArrayInputStream.
trans-unit.target: 此类允许应用程序创建输入流，在该输入流中，读取的字节由字符串的内容提供。应用程序还可以使用 ByteArrayInputStream 从字节数组中读取字节。

trans-unit.source: This class allows for the specification of various parameters while writing a BMP format image file. By default, the data layout is bottom-up, such that the pixels are stored in bottom-up order, the first scanline being stored last.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许在写入BMP格式的图像文件时指定各种参数。默认情况下,数据布局是自下而上的,这样像素是按照自下而上的顺序存储的,第一条扫描线是最后存储的。

trans-unit.source: This class allows rules for identifying future transitions to be expressed. A rule might be written in many forms:
trans-unit.target: 该类允许表达识别未来转换的规则。一个规则可以写成多种形式。

trans-unit.source: This class allows the Source to be the same as the Destination.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许Source与Destination相同。

trans-unit.source: This class also defines factory methods that allow a ClassLoader to be specified when locating a provider. As with installed providers, the provider classes are identified by placing the provider configuration file in the resource directory META-INF/services.
trans-unit.target: 此类还定义了工厂方法，这些方法可在查找提供程序时指定 ClassLoader 。与安装的提供程序一样，通过将提供程序配置文件放在资源目录 META-INF/services 中来标识提供程序类。

trans-unit.source: This class also defines methods for maintaining a selector's cancelled-key set and for removing a key from its channel's key set, and declares the abstract register method that is invoked by a selectable channel's register method in order to perform the actual work of registering a channel.
trans-unit.target: 此类还定义了用于维护选择器的已取消键集以及从其通道的键集中删除键的方法，并声明了由可选通道的 register 方法调用的抽象 register 方法，以执行注册通道的实际工作。

trans-unit.source: This class also defines methods for maintaining a selector's cancelled-key set and for removing a key from its channel's key set, and declares the abstract register method that is invoked by a selectable channel's register method in order to perform the actual work of registering a channel.
trans-unit.target: 此类还定义了用于维护选择器的已取消键集以及从其通道的键集中删除键的方法，并声明了由可选通道的 register 方法调用的抽象 register 方法，以执行注册通道的实际工作。

trans-unit.source: This class also defines methods for replacing matched subsequences with new strings whose contents can, if desired, be computed from the match result. The appendReplacement and appendTail methods can be used in tandem in order to collect the result into an existing string buffer or string builder. Alternatively, the more convenient replaceAll method can be used to create a string in which every matching subsequence in the input sequence is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 此类还定义了用新字符串替换匹配子序列的方法，如果需要，可以根据匹配结果计算其内容。的 appendReplacement 和 appendTail 方法可以以串联，以便收集的结果到现有的字符串缓冲区或字符串生成器一起使用。或者，可以使用更方便的 replaceAll 方法创建一个字符串，在该字符串中替换输入序列中的每个匹配子序列。

trans-unit.source: This class also defines methods for replacing matched subsequences with new strings whose contents can, if desired, be computed from the match result. The appendReplacement and appendTail methods can be used in tandem in order to collect the result into an existing string buffer, or the more convenient replaceAll method can be used to create a string in which every matching subsequence in the input sequence is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 此类还定义了用新字符串替换匹配子序列的方法，如果需要，可以根据匹配结果计算其内容。的 appendReplacement 和 appendTail 方法可以串联使用，以便收集的结果到一个现有的字符串缓冲区，或更方便 replaceAll 方法可用于创建在该输入序列中的每一个匹配的子序列被替换的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This class also defines static methods for testing whether a particular charset is supported, for locating charset instances by name, and for constructing a map that contains every charset for which support is available in the current Java virtual machine. Support for new charsets can be added via the service-provider interface defined in the CharsetProvider class.
trans-unit.target: 此类还定义了静态方法，用于测试是否支持特定的字符集，按名称查找字符集实例，以及构造包含每个字符集的映射，该映射包含当前Java虚拟机中对其提供支持的每个字符集。可以通过 CharsetProvider 类中定义的service-provider接口添加对新字符集的支持。

trans-unit.source: This class also extends FileOwnerAttributeView so as to define methods to get and set the file owner.
trans-unit.target: 该类还扩展了 FileOwnerAttributeView ，以便定义获取和设置文件所有者的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides additional commonly used bounded random generation methods.
trans-unit.target: 该类还提供了其他常用的有界随机生成方法。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides convenience methods to acquire and release multiple permits at a time. These methods are generally more efficient and effective than loops. However, they do not establish any preference order. For example, if thread A invokes s.acquire(3) and thread B invokes s.acquire(2), and two permits become available, then there is no guarantee that thread B will obtain them unless its acquire came first and Semaphore s is in fair mode.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供方便的方法来一次 acquire 和 release 多个许可证。这些方法通常比循环更有效。但是，它们没有建立任何优先顺序。例如，如果线程A调用 s.acquire(3 ）且线程B调用 s.acquire(2) ，并且两个许可变为可用，则无法保证线程B将获取它们，除非其获取首先出现且Semaphore s 是在公平模式下。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides convenience methods to acquire and release multiple permits at a time. Beware of the increased risk of indefinite postponement when these methods are used without fairness set true.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供方便的方法来一次 acquire 和 release 多个许可证。当在不公平的情况下使用这些方法时，请注意无限期推迟的风险增加。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides efficient support for small sets of attributes and compresses them by sharing across uses and taking advantage of their immutable nature. Since many styles are replicated, the potential for sharing is significant, and copies can be extremely cheap. Larger sets reduce the possibility of sharing, and therefore revert automatically to a less space-efficient implementation.
trans-unit.target: 该类还为小的属性集提供了有效的支持,并通过跨用途共享和利用其不可改变的性质对其进行压缩。由于许多样式都是复制的,因此共享的可能性很大,而且副本的价格也非常便宜。更大的集合降低了共享的可能性,因此会自动恢复到空间效率较低的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides hooks that make it possible to supply custom descriptions and names for the MBeanInfo returned by the DynamicMBean interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供了挂钩，可以为DynamicMBean接口返回的 MBeanInfo 提供自定义描述和名称。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides some concurrency support if the Document associated with the JTextComponent is a subclass of AbstractDocument. Access to the View (or View hierarchy) is serialized between any thread mutating the model and the Swing event thread (which is expected to render, do model/view coordinate translation, etc). Any access to the root view should first acquire a read-lock on the AbstractDocument and release that lock in a finally block.
trans-unit.target: 如果与JTextComponent关联的 Document 是 AbstractDocument 的子类，则此类也提供一些并发支持。对视图（或视图层次结构）的访问在任何使模型发生变化的线程与Swing事件线程（预期将呈现，执行模型/视图坐标转换等）之间进行序列化。对根视图的任何访问都应首先获取AbstractDocument上的读取锁，然后在finally块中释放该锁。

trans-unit.source: This class also supports methods that conditionally provide conversions across the three modes. For example, method tryConvertToWriteLock(long) attempts to "upgrade" a mode, returning a valid write stamp if (1) already in writing mode (2) in reading mode and there are no other readers or (3) in optimistic mode and the lock is available. The forms of these methods are designed to help reduce some of the code bloat that otherwise occurs in retry-based designs.
trans-unit.target: 此类还支持有条件地在三种模式之间提供转换的方法。例如，方法 tryConvertToWriteLock(long) 尝试“升级”模式，如果（1）已经处于写入模式（2）处于读取模式并且没有其他读取器，或者（3）处于乐观模式，则返回有效的写入戳记锁可用。这些方法的形式旨在帮助减少在基于重试的设计中原本会发生的某些代码膨胀。

trans-unit.source: This class also supports methods that conditionally provide conversions across the three modes. For example, method tryConvertToWriteLock(long) attempts to "upgrade" a mode, returning a valid write stamp if (1) already in writing mode (2) in reading mode and there are no other readers or (3) in optimistic read mode and the lock is available. The forms of these methods are designed to help reduce some of the code bloat that otherwise occurs in retry-based designs.
trans-unit.target: 此类还支持有条件地在三种模式之间提供转换的方法。例如，方法 tryConvertToWriteLock(long) 尝试“升级”模式，如果（1）已经处于写入模式（2）处于读取模式并且没有其他读取器，或者（3）处于乐观读取模式，则返回有效的写入戳记锁可用。这些方法的形式旨在帮助减少在基于重试的设计中原本会发生的某些代码膨胀。

trans-unit.source: This class also supports methods that conditionally provide conversions across the three modes. For example, method tryConvertToWriteLock(long) attempts to "upgrade" a mode, returning a valid write stamp if (1) already in writing mode (2) in reading mode and there are no other readers or (3) in optimistic mode and the lock is available. The forms of these methods are designed to help reduce some of the code bloat that otherwise occurs in retry-based designs.
trans-unit.target: 此类还支持有条件地在三种模式之间提供转换的方法。例如，方法 tryConvertToWriteLock(long) 尝试“升级”模式，如果（1）已经处于写入模式（2）处于读取模式并且没有其他读取器，或者（3）处于乐观模式，则返回有效的写入标记。锁可用。这些方法的形式旨在帮助减少某些基于重试的设计中发生的代码膨胀。

trans-unit.source: This class always replaces malformed and unmappable character sequences with the charset's default replacement string. The CharsetEncoder class should be used when more control over the encoding process is required.
trans-unit.target: 此类始终用字符集的默认替换字符串替换格式错误和不可映射的字符序列。所述CharsetEncoder当需要在编码处理更多的控制类应当被使用。

trans-unit.source: This class always replaces malformed surrogate elements and unmappable character sequences with the charset's default
trans-unit.target: 该类总是用charset的默认值替换畸形的代用元素和不可映射的字符序列。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Collection 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces. The Iterator provided in method iterator() and the Spliterator provided in method spliterator() are not guaranteed to traverse the elements of the PriorityBlockingQueue in any particular order. If you need ordered traversal, consider using Arrays.sort(pq.toArray()). Also, method drainTo can be used to remove some or all elements in priority order and place them in another collection.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Collection 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。不保证方法 iterator() 中提供的Iterator和方法 spliterator() 中提供的Spliterator以任何特定顺序遍历PriorityBlockingQueue的元素。如果需要有序遍历，请考虑使用 Arrays.sort(pq.toArray()) 。此外，方法 drainTo 可用于去除一些或所有元素的优先顺序，并放置在另一个集合。

trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Collection 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。迭代器在方法中提供 iterator() 是不保证遍历DelayQueue的元素中的任何特定顺序。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces. The Iterator provided in method iterator() is not guaranteed to traverse the elements of the DelayQueue in any particular order.

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces. The Iterator provided in method iterator() is not guaranteed to traverse the elements of the PriorityBlockingQueue in any particular order. If you need ordered traversal, consider using Arrays.sort(pq.toArray()). Also, method drainTo can be used to remove some or all elements in priority order and place them in another collection.
