trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Deque and Iterator interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Deque 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Queue and Iterator interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Queue 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Collection 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces. The Iterator provided in method iterator() and the Spliterator provided in method spliterator() are not guaranteed to traverse the elements of the priority queue in any particular order. If you need ordered traversal, consider using Arrays.sort(pq.toArray()).
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Collection 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。不保证方法 iterator() 中提供的Iterator和方法 spliterator() 中提供的Spliterator以任何特定顺序遍历优先级队列的元素。如果需要有序遍历，请考虑使用 Arrays.sort(pq.toArray()) 。

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterator implement all of the optional methods of the Collection and Iterator interfaces. The Iterator provided in method iterator() is not guaranteed to traverse the elements of the priority queue in any particular order. If you need ordered traversal, consider using Arrays.sort(pq.toArray()).

trans-unit.source: This class and its iterators implement all of the optional methods of the Set and Iterator interfaces. Like most other concurrent collection implementations, this class does not permit the use of null elements, because null arguments and return values cannot be reliably distinguished from the absence of elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其迭代器实现 Set 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。与大多数其他并发集合实现一样，此类不允许使用 null 元素，因为无法将 null 参数和返回值与没有元素可靠地区分开。

trans-unit.source: This class and its subclasses are responsible for mapping between raw tag numbers and TIFFTag objects, which contain additional information about each tag, such as the tag's name, legal data types, and mnemonic names for some or all of its data values.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其子类负责原始标签号和 TIFFTag 对象之间的映射，这些对象包含有关每个标签的其他信息，例如标签的名称，合法数据类型以及其某些或所有数据值的助记符名称。

trans-unit.source: This class and its views and iterators implement all of the optional methods of the Map and Iterator interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其视图和迭代器实现 Map 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。

trans-unit.source: This class and its views and iterators implement all of the optional methods of the Map and Iterator interfaces. Like most other concurrent collections, this class does not permit the use of null keys or values because some null return values cannot be reliably distinguished from the absence of elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类及其视图和迭代器实现 Map 和 Iterator 接口的所有可选方法。与大多数其他并发集合，这个类并没有允许使用的 null 键或值，因为有些空返回值不能可靠地从存在的元素的区别。

trans-unit.source: This class and the Observer interface have been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 此类和 Observer 接口已被弃用。

trans-unit.source: This class and the Observer interface have been deprecated. The event model supported by Observer and Observable is quite limited, the order of notifications delivered by Observable is unspecified, and state changes are not in one-for-one correspondence with notifications. For a richer event model, consider using the java.beans package. For reliable and ordered messaging among threads, consider using one of the concurrent data structures in the java.util.concurrent package. For reactive streams style programming, see the Flow API.
trans-unit.target: 此类和 Observer 接口已被弃用。 Observer 和 Observable 支持的事件模型非常有限， Observable 传递的通知顺序未指定，并且状态更改与通知不一一对应。对于更丰富的事件模型，请考虑使用 java.beans 包。为了在线程之间进行可靠且有序的消息传递，请考虑使用 java.util.concurrent 包中的并发数据结构之一。有关反应式流样式的编程，请参见 Flow API。

trans-unit.source: This class associates, with each thread that uses it, a permit (in the sense of the Semaphore class). A call to park will return immediately if the permit is available, consuming it in the process; otherwise it may block. A call to unpark makes the permit available, if it was not already available. (Unlike with Semaphores though, permits do not accumulate. There is at most one.)
trans-unit.target: 此类与使用它的每个线程关联一个许可（就 Semaphore 类而言）。如果有许可证，将立即返回 park 请求，并在此过程中消耗掉它；否则可能会阻塞。 unpark 的调用使许可证可用（如果尚不可用）。 （不过与信号量不同，许可证不会累积。最多只能有一个。）

trans-unit.source: This class associates, with each thread that uses it, a permit (in the sense of the Semaphore class). A call to park will return immediately if the permit is available, consuming it in the process; otherwise it may block. A call to unpark makes the permit available, if it was not already available. (Unlike with Semaphores though, permits do not accumulate. There is at most one.) Reliable usage requires the use of volatile (or atomic) variables to control when to park or unpark. Orderings of calls to these methods are maintained with respect to volatile variable accesses, but not necessarily non-volatile variable accesses.
trans-unit.target: 此类与使用它的每个线程关联一个许可（就 Semaphore 类而言）。如果有许可证，将立即返回 park 请求，并在此过程中消耗掉它；否则可能会阻塞。 unpark 的调用将使许可证可用（如果尚不可用）。 （但是与信号量不同，许可证不会累积。最多只能有一个。）可靠的使用要求使用易失性（或原子性）变量来控制何时停放或取消停放。相对于易失性变量访问（但不一定是非易失性变量访问），可以维持对这些方法的调用顺序。

trans-unit.source: This class brings more flexibility to the notion of Management Interface in the use of Standard MBeans. Straightforward use of the patterns for Standard MBeans described in the JMX Specification means that there is a fixed relationship between the implementation class of an MBean and its management interface (i.e., if the implementation class is Thing, the management interface must be ThingMBean). This class makes it possible to keep the convenience of specifying the management interface with a Java interface, without requiring that there be any naming relationship between the implementation and interface classes.
trans-unit.target: 这个类在使用标准MBeans的过程中,给管理接口的概念带来了更多的灵活性。直接使用JMX规范中描述的标准MBeans的模式,意味着一个MBean的实现类和它的管理接口之间有固定的关系(即如果实现类是Thing,管理接口必须是ThingMBean)。这个类使得我们可以保持用Java接口指定管理接口的便利性,而不要求实现类和接口类之间存在任何命名关系。

trans-unit.source: This class can be instantiated by a string representation of the RDN defined in RFC 2253 as shown in the following code example:
trans-unit.target: 这个类可以通过RFC 2253中定义的RDN的字符串表示来实例化,如以下代码示例所示。

trans-unit.source: This class can be instantiated by using a string representation of the distinguished name, or by using the ASN.1 DER encoded byte representation of the distinguished name. The current specification for the string representation of a distinguished name is defined in RFC 2253: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): UTF-8 String Representation of Distinguished Names. This class, however, accepts string formats from both RFC 2253 and RFC 1779: A String Representation of Distinguished Names, and also recognizes attribute type keywords whose OIDs (Object Identifiers) are defined in RFC 5280: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Certificate and CRL Profile.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用专有名称的字符串表示形式或通过专有名称的ASN.1 DER编码字节表示形式来实例化此类。可分辨名称的字符串表示形式的当前规范在RFC 2253：轻型目录访问协议（v3）：UTF-8可分辨名称的字符串表示形式中定义。但是，该类同时接受RFC 2253和RFC 1779：专有名称的字符串表示形式的字符串格式，并且还可以识别其OID（对象标识符）在RFC 5280中定义的属性类型关键字：Internet X.509公钥基础结构证书和CRL配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This class can be instantiated by using a string representation of the distinguished name, or by using the ASN.1 DER encoded byte representation of the distinguished name. The current specification for the string representation of a distinguished name is defined in RFC 2253: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): UTF-8 String Representation of Distinguished Names. This class, however, accepts string formats from both RFC 2253 and RFC 1779: A String Representation of Distinguished Names, and also recognizes attribute type keywords whose OIDs (Object Identifiers) are defined in RFC 3280: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Certificate and CRL Profile.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用专有名称的字符串表示形式或通过专有名称的ASN.1 DER编码字节表示形式实例化此类。可分辨名称的字符串表示形式的当前规范在RFC 2253：轻型目录访问协议（v3）：UTF-8可分辨名称的字符串表示形式中定义。但是，该类同时接受RFC 2253和RFC 1779：专有名称的字符串表示形式的字符串格式，并且还可以识别其OID（对象标识符）在RFC 3280中定义的属性类型关键字：Internet X.509公钥基础结构证书和CRL配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This class can be instantiated by using a string representation of the distinguished name, or by using the ASN.1 DER encoded byte representation of the distinguished name. The current specification for the string representation of a distinguished name is defined in RFC 2253: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): UTF-8 String Representation of Distinguished Names. This class, however, accepts string formats from both RFC 2253 and RFC 1779: A String Representation of Distinguished Names, and also recognizes attribute type keywords whose OIDs (Object Identifiers) are defined in RFC 5280: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Certificate and CRL Profile.

trans-unit.source: This class can be serialized and stores the string zone ID in the external form. The ZoneOffset subclass uses a dedicated format that only stores the offset from UTC/Greenwich.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以序列化，并以外部形式存储字符串区域ID。该 ZoneOffset 子类使用专用的格式，只是存储从UTC /格林威治抵消。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to initialize a Cipher object that implements the
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于初始化实现以下功能的 Cipher 对象：

trans-unit.source: This class can contain basic error or warning information from either the XML parser or the application: a parser writer or application writer can subclass it to provide additional functionality. SAX handlers may throw this exception or any exception subclassed from it.
trans-unit.target: 这个类可以包含来自XML解析器或应用程序的基本错误或警告信息:解析器编写者或应用程序编写者可以将其子类化以提供额外的功能。SAX处理程序可以抛出这个异常或由它子类化的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be instantiated. It has only static methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个类不能被实例化。它只有静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be instantiated. Only a single instance of this class can exist, and it may be obtained by using the getSplashScreen() static method. In case the splash screen has not been created at application startup via the command line or manifest file option, the getSplashScreen method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 此类无法实例化。此类的单个实例可以存在，并且可以使用 getSplashScreen() 静态方法获得该实例。如果在启动应用程序时未通过命令行或清单文件选项创建启动画面，则 getSplashScreen 方法将返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This class centralizes all security properties and common security methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个类集中了所有的安全属性和常用的安全方法。

trans-unit.source: This class centralizes all security properties and common security methods. One of its primary uses is to manage providers.
trans-unit.target: 这个类集中了所有的安全属性和常用的安全方法。其主要用途之一是管理提供者。

trans-unit.source: This class collects together key details of a span of text.
trans-unit.target: 这一类收集了一个跨度文本的关键细节。

trans-unit.source: This class collects together key details of a span of text. It is used by implementors of the class AccessibleExtendedText in order to return the requested triplet of a String, and the start and end indicies/offsets into a larger body of text that the String comes from.
trans-unit.target: 此类收集文本范围的关键详细信息。类 AccessibleExtendedText 的实现者使用它，以便将请求的 String 三元组以及开始和结束标记/偏移量返回到 String 所来自的较大文本体中。

trans-unit.source: This class collects together the span of text that share the same contiguous set of attributes, along with that set of attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该类将共享相同的毗连属性集的文本跨度以及该属性集收集在一起。

trans-unit.source: This class collects together the span of text that share the same contiguous set of attributes, along with that set of attributes. It is used by implementors of the class AccessibleContext in order to generate ACCESSIBLE_TEXT_ATTRIBUTES_CHANGED events.
trans-unit.target: 此类将共享同一组连续属性以及同一组属性的文本范围收集在一起。类 AccessibleContext 的实现者使用它来生成 ACCESSIBLE_TEXT_ATTRIBUTES_CHANGED 事件。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods for obtaining encoders and decoders for the Base64 encoding scheme.
trans-unit.target: 该类完全由静态方法组成,用于获取Base64编码方案的编码器和解码器。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods for obtaining encoders and decoders for the Base64 encoding scheme. The implementation of this class supports the following types of Base64 as specified in RFC 4648 and RFC 2045.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅包含用于获取Base64编码方案的编码器和解码器的静态方法。此类的实现支持RFC 4648和RFC 2045中指定的以下Base64类型。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods for obtaining encoders and decoders for the Base64 encoding scheme. The implementation of this class supports the following types of Base64 as specified in RFC 4648 and RFC 2045.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅包含用于获取Base64编码方案的编码器和解码器的静态方法。此类的实现支持RFC 4648和RFC 2045中指定的以下Base64类型。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that help adapt method handles to other JVM types, such as interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这个类完全由静态方法组成,这些方法有助于使方法句柄适应其他JVM类型,如接口。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on files, directories, or other types of files.
trans-unit.target: 这个类完全由对文件、目录或其他类型的文件进行操作的静态方法组成。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return collections.
trans-unit.target: 这个类完全由操作或返回集合的静态方法组成。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return collections. It contains polymorphic algorithms that operate on collections, "wrappers", which return a new collection backed by a specified collection, and a few other odds and ends.
trans-unit.target: 这个类完全由操作或返回集合的静态方法组成。它包含了对集合进行操作的多态算法,"包装器",即返回一个由指定集合支持的新集合,以及其他一些零碎的东西。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return method handles.
trans-unit.target: 这个类完全由操作或返回方法句柄的静态方法组成。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return method handles. They fall into several categories:
trans-unit.target: 这个类完全由操作或返回方法句柄的静态方法组成。它们可分为几类。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on sets of PosixFilePermission objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅包含对 PosixFilePermission 对象集进行操作的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This class consists exclusively of static methods that return a Path by converting a path string or URI.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅由静态方法组成，这些静态方法通过转换路径字符串或 URI 返回 Path 。

trans-unit.source: This class consists of static utility methods for operating on objects, or checking certain conditions before operation.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含用于对对象进行操作或在操作之前检查某些条件的 static 实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: This class consists of static utility methods for operating on objects, or checking certain conditions before operation. These utilities include null-safe or null-tolerant methods for computing the hash code of an object, returning a string for an object, comparing two objects, and checking if indexes or sub-range values are out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含用于对对象进行操作或在操作之前检查某些条件的 static 实用程序方法。这些实用程序包括 null -safe或 null 用于计算对象的哈希码，对于对象返回的字符串，比较两个对象，并且检查是否索引或子范围的值是出界-tolerant方法。

trans-unit.source: This class consists of static utility methods for operating on objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含用于对对象进行操作的 static 实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: This class consists of static utility methods for operating on objects. These utilities include null-safe or null-tolerant methods for computing the hash code of an object, returning a string for an object, and comparing two objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含用于对对象进行操作的 static 实用程序方法。这些实用程序包括 null -safe或 null 用于计算对象的哈希码，对于对象返回的字符串，并比较两个对象-tolerant方法。

trans-unit.source: This class contains a standard set of adjusters, available as static methods. These include:
trans-unit.target: 该类包含一组标准的调整器,作为静态方法提供。这些方法包括:

trans-unit.source: This class contains an export/import facility, allowing preferences to be "exported" to an XML document, and XML documents representing preferences to be "imported" back into the system. This facility may be used to back up all or part of a preference tree, and subsequently restore from the backup.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含一个导出/导入工具,允许将首选项 "导出 "到XML文档,并将代表首选项的XML文档 "导入 "到系统中。该工具可用于备份全部或部分偏好树,并随后从备份中恢复。

trans-unit.source: This class contains constant values representing the type of action(s) to be performed by a Drag and Drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含代表拖放操作所要执行的操作类型的常量值。

trans-unit.source: This class contains methods for creating context objects and objects referred to by location information in the naming or directory service.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含用于创建上下文对象和命名或目录服务中由位置信息引用的对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class contains methods for supporting DirContext implementations.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含支持 DirContext 实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class contains static methods for creating an XML reader from an explicit class name, or based on runtime defaults:
trans-unit.target: 该类包含静态方法,用于从一个显式类名或基于运行时默认值创建一个XML阅读器。

trans-unit.source: This class contains various methods for manipulating arrays (such as sorting and searching).
trans-unit.target: 该类包含各种操作数组的方法(如排序和搜索)。

trans-unit.source: This class contains various methods for manipulating arrays (such as sorting and searching). This class also contains a static factory that allows arrays to be viewed as lists.
trans-unit.target: 这个类包含了各种操作数组的方法(如排序和搜索)。该类还包含一个静态工厂,允许将数组作为列表查看。

trans-unit.source: This class creates SSL sockets using the default SSLSocketFactory (see SSLSocketFactory.getDefault()) or the default SSLServerSocketFactory (see SSLServerSocketFactory.getDefault()) unless the constructor taking an SSLContext is used in which case the SSL sockets are created using the SSLSocketFactory returned by SSLContext.getSocketFactory() or the SSLServerSocketFactory returned by SSLContext.getServerSocketFactory(). When an SSLContext is not supplied all the instances of this class share the same keystore, and the same truststore (when client authentication is required by the server). This behavior can be modified by supplying an already initialized SSLContext instance.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用默认的 SSLSocketFactory （请参见 SSLSocketFactory.getDefault() ）或默认的 SSLServerSocketFactory （请参见 SSLServerSocketFactory.getDefault() ）创建SSL套接字，除非使用采用 SSLContext 的构造函数，在这种情况下，将使用由以下方法返回的 SSLSocketFactory 创建SSL套接字。 SSLContext.getSocketFactory() 或 SSLServerSocketFactory 返回的 SSLContext.getServerSocketFactory() 。当一个 SSLContext 未提供时，此类的所有实例都共享相同的密钥库和相同的信任库（当服务器要求客户端身份验证时）。可以通过提供一个已经初始化的 SSLContext 实例来修改此行为。

trans-unit.source: This class creates SSL sockets using the default SSLSocketFactory (see SSLSocketFactory.getDefault()). All instances of this class are functionally equivalent. In particular, they all share the same truststore, and the same keystore when client authentication is required by the server. This behavior can be modified in subclasses by overriding the createSocket(String,int) method; in that case, equals and hashCode may also need to be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用默认的 SSLSocketFactory 创建SSL套接字（请参阅 SSLSocketFactory.getDefault() ）。此类的所有实例在功能上都是等效的。特别是，当服务器需要客户端身份验证时，它们都共享相同的信任库和相同的密钥库。可以通过重写 createSocket(String,int) 方法在子类中修改此行为。在这种情况下， equals 和 hashCode 也可能需要重写。

trans-unit.source: This class creates a labeled button.
trans-unit.target: 该类创建一个标签按钮。

trans-unit.source: This class creates a labeled button. The application can cause some action to happen when the button is pushed. This image depicts three views of a "Quit" button as it appears under the Solaris operating system:
trans-unit.target: 此类创建带标签的按钮。按下按钮时，应用程序可能会导致某些动作发生。此图像描绘了Solaris操作系统下出现的“ Quit ”按钮的三个视图：

trans-unit.source: This class creates server sockets.
trans-unit.target: 该类创建服务器套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class creates server sockets. It may be subclassed by other factories, which create particular types of server sockets. This provides a general framework for the addition of public socket-level functionality. It is the server side analogue of a socket factory, and similarly provides a way to capture a variety of policies related to the sockets being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 该类创建服务器套接字。它可以被其他工厂子类化,这些工厂创建特定类型的服务器套接字。这为增加公共套接字级别的功能提供了一个通用框架。它是套接字工厂的服务器端类似物,同样也提供了一种方法来捕获与被构造的套接字相关的各种策略。

trans-unit.source: This class creates sockets.
trans-unit.target: 该类创建套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class creates sockets. It may be subclassed by other factories, which create particular subclasses of sockets and thus provide a general framework for the addition of public socket-level functionality.
trans-unit.target: 该类创建socket。它可以被其他工厂子类化,这些工厂创建了特定的套接字子类,从而为增加公共套接字级别的功能提供了一个总体框架。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a dismiss method that removes the editors ChangeListener from the JSpinner that it's part of. The setEditor method knows about DefaultEditor.dismiss, so if the developer replaces an editor that's derived from JSpinner.DefaultEditor its ChangeListener connection back to the JSpinner will be removed. However after that, it's up to the developer to manage their editor listeners. Similarly, if a subclass overrides createEditor, it's up to the subclasser to deal with their editor subsequently being replaced (with setEditor). We expect that in most cases, and in editor installed with setEditor or created by a createEditor override, will not be replaced anyway.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义一个 dismiss 方法，该方法从其所属的 JSpinner 中删除编辑器 ChangeListener 。该 setEditor 方法知道 DefaultEditor.dismiss ，所以如果开发商替换的FROM衍生编辑 JSpinner.DefaultEditor 的它 ChangeListener 连接返回到 JSpinner 的将被删除。但是，此后，开发人员需要管理其编辑器侦听器。同样，如果子类覆盖 createEditor ，则由子类负责处理随后被其替换的编辑器（用 setEditor 替换）。）。我们希望在大多数情况下，并且在安装了 setEditor 或由 createEditor 替代创建的编辑器中，无论如何都不会被替换。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a content signing service. Implementations must be instantiable using a zero-argument constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这个类定义了一个内容签名服务。实现必须使用一个零参数的构造函数来实例化。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a lookup table object.
trans-unit.target: 这个类定义了一个查找表对象。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a lookup table object. The output of a lookup operation using an object of this class is interpreted as an unsigned byte quantity. The lookup table contains byte data arrays for one or more bands (or components) of an image, and it contains an offset which will be subtracted from the input values before indexing the arrays. This allows an array smaller than the native data size to be provided for a constrained input. If there is only one array in the lookup table, it will be applied to all bands.
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了一个查找表对象。使用该类对象进行的查找操作的输出被解释为一个无符号字节量。查找表包含图像的一个或多个波段(或组件)的字节数据数组,它包含一个偏移量,该偏移量将在数组索引之前从输入值中减去。这就允许为一个受限的输入提供一个小于本机数据大小的数组。如果在查找表中只有一个数组,它将应用于所有波段。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a lookup table object. The output of a lookup operation using an object of this class is interpreted as an unsigned short quantity. The lookup table contains short data arrays for one or more bands (or components) of an image, and it contains an offset which will be subtracted from the input values before indexing the arrays. This allows an array smaller than the native data size to be provided for a constrained input. If there is only one array in the lookup table, it will be applied to all bands.
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了一个查找表对象。使用该类对象进行的查找操作的输出被解释为一个无符号短量。查找表包含图像的一个或多个波段(或组件)的短数据数组,它包含一个偏移量,该偏移量将在数组索引之前从输入值中减去。这就允许为一个受限的输入提供一个小于本机数据大小的数组。如果在查找表中只有一个数组,它将应用于所有波段。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a nested AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject class that can be used as a Condition implementation by subclasses supporting exclusive mode for which method isHeldExclusively() reports whether synchronization is exclusively held with respect to the current thread, method release(int) invoked with the current getState() value fully releases this object, and acquire(int), given this saved state value, eventually restores this object to its previous acquired state. No AbstractQueuedSynchronizer method otherwise creates such a condition, so if this constraint cannot be met, do not use it. The behavior of AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject depends of course on the semantics of its synchronizer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了一个嵌套的 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject 类，该类可被支持独占模式的子类用作 Condition 实现， isHeldExclusively() 独占方式isHeldExclusively（）报告是否相对于当前线程独占同步，方法 release(int) 由当前线程调用 getState() 值会完全释放该对象，并在 acquire(int) 此保存状态值的情况下获取（int）最终将其恢复到之前的获取状态。否则，没有 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 方法会创建这样的条件，因此，如果无法满足此约束，请不要使用它。的行为 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject 当然， AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject取决于其同步器实现的语义。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a nested AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject class that can be used as a Condition implementation by subclasses supporting exclusive mode for which method isHeldExclusively() reports whether synchronization is exclusively held with respect to the current thread, method release(int) invoked with the current getState() value fully releases this object, and acquire(java.util.concurrent.locks.AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.Node, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, long), given this saved state value, eventually restores this object to its previous acquired state. No AbstractQueuedSynchronizer method otherwise creates such a condition, so if this constraint cannot be met, do not use it. The behavior of AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject depends of course on the semantics of its synchronizer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了一个嵌套的 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject 类，该类可以被支持独占模式的子类用作 Condition 实现， isHeldExclusively() 独占方式isHeldExclusively（）报告是否相对于当前线程独享同步，方法 release(int) 由当前线程调用 getState() 值会完全释放此对象，并 acquire(java.util.concurrent.locks.AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.Node, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, long) ，并赋予此保存的状态值，最终将其恢复为先前的获取状态。没有 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 方法否则会创建这样的条件，因此，如果无法满足此约束，请不要使用它。当然， AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject 的行为取决于其同步器实现的语义。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a nested AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject class that can be used as a Condition implementation by subclasses supporting exclusive mode for which method isHeldExclusively() reports whether synchronization is exclusively held with respect to the current thread, method release(int) invoked with the current getState() value fully releases this object, and acquire(int), given this saved state value, eventually restores this object to its previous acquired state. No AbstractQueuedSynchronizer method otherwise creates such a condition, so if this constraint cannot be met, do not use it. The behavior of AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject depends of course on the semantics of its synchronizer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了一个嵌套的 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject 类，该类可以被支持独占模式的子类用作 Condition 实现，对于该独占模式，方法 isHeldExclusively() 报告是否相对于当前线程专有地保持同步，方法 release(int) 由当前线程调用 getState() 值会完全释放此对象，并在 acquire(int) 此保存状态值的情况下获取（int）最终将其恢复到之前的获取状态。否则，没有 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 方法会创建这样的条件，因此，如果无法满足此约束，请不要使用它。的行为 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject 当然， AbstractQueuedSynchronizer.ConditionObject取决于其同步器实现的语义。

trans-unit.source: This class defines all known operation-set bits, but precisely which bits are supported by a given channel depends upon the type of the channel. Each subclass of SelectableChannel defines a validOps() method which returns a set identifying just those operations that are supported by the channel. An attempt to set or test an operation-set bit that is not supported by a key's channel will result in an appropriate run-time exception.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了所有已知的操作集位，但是精确地给定通道支持哪些位取决于通道的类型。 SelectableChannel 的每个子类都定义一个 validOps() 方法，该方法返回一个集合，该集合仅标识通道支持的那些操作。尝试设置或测试键通道不支持的操作集位将导致适当的运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: This class defines all known operation-set bits, but precisely which bits are supported by a given channel depends upon the type of the channel. Each subclass of SelectableChannel defines an validOps() method which returns a set identifying just those operations that are supported by the channel. An attempt to set or test an operation-set bit that is not supported by a key's channel will result in an appropriate run-time exception.

Each subclass of SelectableChannel defines an validOps() method which returns a set identifying just those operations that are supported by the channel. An attempt to set or test an operation-set bit that is not supported by a key's channel will result in an appropriate run-time exception.

trans-unit.target: 该类定义了ISO日历系统特有的字段和单位。

trans-unit.target: 该类定义了四类对char缓冲区的操作。

trans-unit.source: This class defines four categories of operations upon double buffers:
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了对双缓冲区的四类操作。

trans-unit.source: This class defines login and logout methods for a provider.
trans-unit.target: 这个类定义了提供者的登录和注销方法。

trans-unit.source: This class defines methods for reading and writing values of all other primitive types, except boolean. Primitive values are translated to (or from) sequences of bytes according to the buffer's current byte order, which may be retrieved and modified via the order methods. Specific byte orders are represented by instances of the ByteOrder class. The initial order of a byte buffer is always BIG_ENDIAN.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义用于读取和写入除 boolean 之外的所有其他基本类型的值的方法。根据缓冲区的当前字节顺序将原始值转换为字节序列（或从字节序列转换为字节序列），可以通过 order 方法来检索和修改基元值。特定的字节顺序由 ByteOrder 类的实例表示。字节缓冲区的初始顺序始终为 BIG_ENDIAN 。

trans-unit.source: This class defines methods for reading and writing values of all other primitive types, except boolean. Primitive values are translated to (or from) sequences of bytes according to the buffer's current byte order, which may be retrieved and modified via the order methods. Specific byte orders are represented by instances of the ByteOrder class. The initial order of a byte buffer is always BIG_ENDIAN.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义用于读取和写入除 boolean 之外的所有其他基本类型的值的方法。根据缓冲区的当前字节顺序将原始值转换为字节序列（或从字节序列转换为字节序列），可以通过 order 方法进行检索和修改。特定的字节顺序由 ByteOrder 类的实例表示。字节缓冲区的初始顺序始终为 BIG_ENDIAN 。

trans-unit.source: This class defines methods that handle the mechanics of channel registration, deregistration, and closing. It maintains the current blocking mode of this channel as well as its current set of selection keys. It performs all of the synchronization required to implement the SelectableChannel specification. Implementations of the abstract protected methods defined in this class need not synchronize against other threads that might be engaged in the same operations.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了处理通道注册，注销和关闭机制的方法。它保持该通道的当前阻止模式及其当前的选择键集。它执行实现 SelectableChannel 规范所需的所有同步。此类中定义的抽象保护方法的实现无需与可能参与相同操作的其他线程进行同步。

trans-unit.source: This class defines several factory methods for constructing and combining memory access var handles.
trans-unit.target: 这个类定义了几个工厂方法,用于构造和组合内存访问变量句柄。

trans-unit.source: This class defines several factory methods for constructing and combining memory access var handles. To obtain a memory access var handle, clients must start from one of the leaf methods (see varHandle(Class, ByteOrder), varHandle(Class, long, ByteOrder)). This determines the variable type (all primitive types but void and boolean are supported), as well as the alignment constraint and the byte order associated to a memory access var handle. The resulting memory access var handle can then be combined in various ways to emulate different addressing modes. The var handles created by this class feature a mandatory coordinate type (of type MemoryAddress), and zero or more long coordinate types, which can be used to emulate multi-dimensional array indexing.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了一些用于构造和组合内存访问var句柄的工厂方法。要获得内存访问var句柄，客户端必须从叶子方法之一开始（请参阅 varHandle(Class, ByteOrder) ， varHandle(Class, long, ByteOrder) ）。这将确定变量类型（支持所有基本类型，但 void 和 boolean 除外），以及对齐约束和与内存访问var句柄关联的字节顺序。然后可以以各种方式组合生成的内存访问var句柄，以模拟不同的寻址模式。此类创建的var句柄具有强制坐标类型（ MemoryAddress 类型）），以及零个或多个 long 坐标类型，可用于模拟多维数组索引。

trans-unit.source: This class defines six categories of operations upon byte buffers:
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了六类对字节缓冲区的操作。

trans-unit.source: This class defines static methods that support the interoperation of the stream classes of the java.io package with the channel classes of this package.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了静态方法，这些方法支持 java.io 包的流类与该包的通道类的互操作。

trans-unit.source: This class defines static methods that support the interoperation of the stream classes of the java.io package with the channel classes of this package.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义了静态方法，这些方法支持 java.io 包的流类与该包的通道类的互操作。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the attributes of an SGML element as described in a DTD using the ATTLIST construct.
trans-unit.target: 这个类定义了一个SGML元素的属性,正如在DTD中使用ATTLIST构造描述的那样。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the attributes of an SGML element as described in a DTD using the ATTLIST construct. An AttributeList can be obtained from the Element class using the getAttributes() method.
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了一个SGML元素的属性,正如在DTD中使用ATTLIST构造所描述的那样。可以使用getAttributes()方法从Element类中获得一个AttributeList。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the functionality of a certificate factory, which is used to generate certificate, certification path (CertPath) and certificate revocation list (CRL) objects from their encodings.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义证书工厂的功能，该功能用于根据其编码生成证书，证书路径（ CertPath ）和证书吊销列表（CRL）对象。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the methods supportsParameter() and newInstance() which are used by the Java security framework when it searches for suitable services and instantiates them. The valid arguments to those methods depend on the type of service. For the service types defined within Java SE, see the Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA) Reference Guide for the valid values. Note that components outside of Java SE can define additional types of services and their behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义Java安全框架在搜索合适的服务并将其实例化时使用的方法 newInstance() supportsParameter() 和newInstance（）。这些方法的有效参数取决于服务的类型。有关Java SE中定义的服务类型，请参阅《Java密码体系结构（JCA）参考指南》以获取有效值。请注意，Java SE之外的组件可以定义其他类型的服务及其行为。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the methods supportsParameter() and newInstance() which are used by the Java security framework when it searches for suitable services and instantiates them. The valid arguments to those methods depend on the type of service. For the service types defined within Java SE, see the Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA) Reference Guide for the valid values. Note that components outside of Java SE can define additional types of services and their behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义Java安全框架在搜索合适的服务并将其实例化时使用的方法 newInstance() supportsParameter() 和newInstance（）。这些方法的有效参数取决于服务的类型。有关Java SE中定义的服务类型，请参阅《Java密码体系结构（JCA）参考指南》以获取有效值。请注意，Java SE之外的组件可以定义其他类型的服务及其行为。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the policy of how to locate, load, and instantiate SASL clients and servers.
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了如何定位、加载和实例化SASL客户端和服务器的策略。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the valid eras for the Japanese chronology. Japan introduced the Gregorian calendar starting with Meiji 6. Only Meiji and later eras are supported; dates before Meiji 6, January 1 are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 这一类定义了日本年表的有效年代。日本从明治6年开始采用格里高利历。只支持明治及以后的年代,不支持明治6年1月1日前的日期。

trans-unit.source: This class defines useful layout constants.
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了有用的布局常数。

trans-unit.source: This class defines useful layout constants. Some of the constants defined in this class are explicit in both size and byte order (see BITS_64_BE), and can therefore be used to explicitly and unambiguously specify the contents of a memory segment. Other constants make implicit byte order assumptions (see JAVA_INT); as such, these constants make it easy to work with other serialization-centric APIs, such as ByteBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义有用的布局常量。此类中定义的某些常量在大小和字节顺序上都是显式的（请参阅 BITS_64_BE ），因此可以用于显式且明确地指定内存段的内容。其他常量进行隐式字节顺序假设（请参阅 JAVA_INT ）；否则为false。这样，这些常量使得与其他以序列化为中心的API（例如 ByteBuffer )一起使用变得容易。

trans-unit.source: This class deflates sequences of bytes into ZLIB compressed data format. The input byte sequence is provided in either byte array or byte buffer, via one of the setInput() methods. The output byte sequence is written to the output byte array or byte buffer passed to the deflate() methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类将字节序列压缩为ZLIB压缩数据格式。通过 setInput() 方法之一在字节数组或字节缓冲区中提供输入字节序列。输出字节序列被写入传递给 deflate() 方法的输出字节数组或字节缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This class depends upon EventQueueMonitor, which provides the base level support for capturing the top-level containers as they are created.
trans-unit.target: 此类取决于 EventQueueMonitor ，它为创建顶级容器时捕获顶级容器提供了基础支持。

trans-unit.source: This class describes the various problems which can be encountered when accessing a role.
trans-unit.target: 该类描述了访问角色时可能遇到的各种问题。

trans-unit.source: This class does
trans-unit.target: 这类人不

trans-unit.source: This class does not impose a reader or writer preference ordering for lock access. However, it does support an optional fairness policy.
trans-unit.target: 此类不对锁定访问强加读取器或写入器首选项顺序。但是，它确实支持可选的公平性政策。

trans-unit.source: This class does not participate in any JAXP 1.3 or JAXP 1.4 processing. It must not be used by users or JAXP implementations.
trans-unit.target: 该类不参与任何 JAXP 1.3 或 JAXP 1.4 处理。用户或JAXP实现不得使用该类。

trans-unit.source: This class does not properly convert characters into bytes.
trans-unit.target: 该类不能正确地将字符转换为字节。

trans-unit.source: This class does not properly convert characters into bytes. As of JDK 1.1, the preferred way to create a stream from a string is via the StringReader class.
trans-unit.target: 此类无法正确将字符转换为字节。从JDK 1.1开始，从字符串创建流的首选方法是通过 StringReader 类。

trans-unit.source: This class does not store or represent a date or time-zone. Instead, it is a description of the local time as seen on a wall clock. It cannot represent an instant on the time-line without additional information such as an offset or time-zone.
trans-unit.target: 该类不存储或代表日期或时区。相反,它是对挂钟上的当地时间的描述。如果没有额外的信息,如偏移或时区,它不能代表时间线上的一个瞬间。

trans-unit.source: This class does not store or represent a day, time or time-zone. For example, the value "October 2007" can be stored in a YearMonth.
trans-unit.target: 此类不存储或表示日期，时间或时区。例如，值“ October 2007”可以存储在 YearMonth 中。

trans-unit.source: This class does not store or represent a month, day, time or time-zone. For example, the value "2007" can be stored in a Year.
trans-unit.target: 此类不存储或表示月份，日期，时间或时区。例如，值“ 2007”可以存储在 Year 中。

trans-unit.source: This class does not store or represent a time or time-zone. Instead, it is a description of the date, as used for birthdays. It cannot represent an instant on the time-line without additional information such as an offset or time-zone.
trans-unit.target: 该类不存储或代表时间或时区。相反,它是对日期的描述,就像生日一样。如果没有额外的信息,如偏移或时区,它不能代表时间线上的一个瞬间。

trans-unit.source: This class does not store or represent a time-zone. Instead, it is a description of the date, as used for birthdays, combined with the local time as seen on a wall clock. It cannot represent an instant on the time-line without additional information such as an offset or time-zone.
trans-unit.target: 该类不存储或代表时区。相反,它是对日期的描述,就像生日一样,结合挂钟上的当地时间。如果没有额外的信息,如偏移或时区,它不能代表时间线上的一个瞬间。

trans-unit.source: This class does not store or represent a year, time or time-zone. For example, the value "December 3rd" can be stored in a MonthDay.
trans-unit.target: 此类不存储或表示年份，时间或时区。例如，值“ December 3rd”可以存储在 MonthDay 中。

trans-unit.source: This class enables a programmer to create an object and protect its confidentiality with a cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该类使程序员能够创建一个对象,并通过加密算法保护其机密性。

trans-unit.source: This class enables one to store an entry in the defaults table that isn't constructed until the first time it's looked up with one of the getXXX(key) methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类使您可以在默认表中存储一个条目，该条目在 getXXX(key) 方法之一进行首次查找之前才构造。

trans-unit.source: This class enables one to store an entry in the defaults table that isn't constructed until the first time it's looked up with one of the getXXX(key) methods. Lazy values are useful for defaults that are expensive to construct or are seldom retrieved. The first time a LazyValue is retrieved its "real value" is computed by calling LazyValue.createValue() and the real value is used to replace the LazyValue in the UIDefaults table. Subsequent lookups for the same key return the real value. Here's an example of a LazyValue that constructs a Border:
trans-unit.target: 此类使您可以在默认表中存储一个条目，该条目在 getXXX(key) 方法之一进行首次查找之前才构造。对于构造成本高昂或很少检索到的默认值，惰性值很有用。一个在第一时间 LazyValue 检索其“实际值”是通过调用计算 LazyValue.createValue() 和实际值被用于代替 LazyValue 在 UIDefaults 的表。随后对同一个键的查找将返回实际值。这是构造 Border 的 LazyValue 的示例：

trans-unit.source: This class enables one to store an entry in the defaults table that's constructed each time it's looked up with one of the getXXX(key) methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类使您可以将条目存储在每次使用 getXXX(key) 方法之一进行查询时构造的默认表中。

trans-unit.source: This class enables one to store an entry in the defaults table that's constructed each time it's looked up with one of the getXXX(key) methods. Here's an example of an ActiveValue that constructs a DefaultListCellRenderer:
trans-unit.target: 此类使您可以将条目存储在每次使用 getXXX(key) 方法之一进行查询时构造的默认表中。这是一个构造 DefaultListCellRenderer 的 ActiveValue 的示例：

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a HTTP request received and a response to be generated in one exchange.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个收到的HTTP请求和一个要在一次交换中生成的响应。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a HTTP request received and a response to be generated in one exchange. It provides methods for examining the request from the client, and for building and sending the response.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了接收到的HTTP请求和在一次交换中生成的响应。它提供了检查来自客户端的请求,以及构建和发送响应的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a HTTPS request received and a response to be generated in one exchange and defines the extensions to HttpExchange that are specific to the HTTPS protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该类将接收到的HTTPS请求和要生成的响应封装在一个交换中,并定义了HTTPS协议特有的HttpExchange扩展。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a Kerberos 5 KRB_CRED message which can be used to send Kerberos credentials from one principal to another.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个 Kerberos 5 KRB_CRED 消息,它可以用来将 Kerberos 凭证从一个委托人发送到另一个委托人。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a Kerberos principal.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个 Kerberos 主体。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a Kerberos ticket and associated information as viewed from the client's point of view.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个 Kerberos 票据和相关信息,从客户端的角度来看。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a Kerberos ticket and associated information as viewed from the client's point of view. It captures all information that the Key Distribution Center (KDC) sends to the client in the reply message KDC-REP defined in the Kerberos Protocol Specification (RFC 4120).
trans-unit.target: 从客户端的角度来看，此类封装了Kerberos票证和相关信息。它捕获Kerberos协议规范（RFC 4120）中定义的回复消息KDC-REP中的密钥分发中心（KDC）发送给客户端的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a Kerberos ticket and associated information as viewed from the client's point of view. It captures all information that the Key Distribution Center (KDC) sends to the client in the reply message KDC-REP defined in the Kerberos Protocol Specification (RFC 4120).
trans-unit.target: 从客户端的角度来看，此类封装了Kerberos票证和相关信息。它捕获在Kerberos协议规范（RFC 4120）中定义的回复消息KDC-REP中，密钥分发中心（KDC）发送给客户端的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a collection of states of the Accessible object and is obtained by calling the getAccessibleStateSet method on an AccessibleContext. Since an object might have multiple states (e.g. it might be both "Checked" and "Focused"), this class is needed to encapsulate a collection of these states. Methods in the class provide for retrieving the individual AccessibleStates on the state set.
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了Accessible对象的状态的集合，并通过调用获得 getAccessibleStateSet 上的方法的AccessibleContext。由于对象可能具有多个状态（例如，可能同时处于“已检查”和“已聚焦”状态），因此需要此类来封装这些状态的集合。该类中的方法提供了在状态集中检索单个AccessibleStates的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a keytab file.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个keytab文件。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a long term secret key for a Kerberos principal.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了 Kerberos 主体的长期秘钥。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a particular state of the Accessible object. Accessible states include things like "Armed", "Busy", "Checked", "Focused", etc. These roles are identified by the constants in this class such as AccessibleState.ARMED, AccessibleState.BUSY, AccessibleState.CHECKED, and AccessibleState.FOCUSED. The sum of all the states of an Accessible object is called the AccessibleStateSet, and can be obtained by calling the getAccessibleStateSet method on an AccessibleContext.
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了Accessible对象的特定状态。可访问状态包括“武装”，“忙”，“已检查”，“集中”等内容。这些角色由此类中的常量标识，例如 AccessibleState.ARMED, AccessibleState.BUSY, AccessibleState.CHECKED, 和 AccessibleState.FOCUSED 。所有Accessible对象的状态的总和被称为AccessibleStateSet，并且可以通过调用能够得到 getAccessibleStateSet 上的方法的AccessibleContext。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a single tab stop (basically as tab stops are thought of by RTF).
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个单一的tab stop(基本上就像RTF认为的tab stop一样)。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a single tab stop (basically as tab stops are thought of by RTF). A tab stop is at a specified distance from the left margin, aligns text in a specified way, and has a specified leader. TabStops are immutable, and usually contained in TabSets.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个单一的制表符停止符(基本上就像RTF认为的制表符停止符一样)。一个tab stop与左边缘有一定的距离,以指定的方式排列文本,并有一个指定的领导。TabStops是不可改变的,通常包含在TabSets中。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates all relevant details of a clipboard or drag and drop transfer, and also allows for customizing aspects of the drag and drop experience.
trans-unit.target: 该类封装了剪贴板或拖放传输的所有相关细节,还允许自定义拖放体验的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates an EncryptionKey used in Kerberos.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了 Kerberos 中使用的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates factors that determine scope of search and what gets returned as a result of the search.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了决定搜索范围和搜索结果返回的因素。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates information about a code signer.
trans-unit.target: 该类封装了代码签名者的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates information about a code signer. It is immutable.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了代码签名者的信息。它是不可改变的。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates information about a signed timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 该类封装了关于签名时间戳的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates information about a signed timestamp. It is immutable. It includes the timestamp's date and time as well as information about the Timestamping Authority (TSA) which generated and signed the timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 该类封装了关于签名时间戳的信息。它是不可改变的。它包括时间戳的日期和时间,以及生成和签署时间戳的时间戳机构(TSA)的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the Accessible object's role in the user interface and is obtained by calling the getAccessibleRole method on an AccessibleContext. Accessible roles include "Check box", "Menu Item", "Panel", etc. These roles are identified by the constants in this class such as AccessibleRole.CHECK_BOX, AccessibleRole.MENU_ITEM, and AccessibleRole.PANEL. The constants in this class present a strongly typed enumeration of common object roles. A public constructor for this class has been purposely omitted and applications should use one of the constants from this class. Although this class pre-defines a large list of standard roles, it is extensible so additional programmer-defined roles can be added in the future without needing to modify the base class.
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了Accessible对象的用户界面的作用，是通过调用获得 getAccessibleRole 上的方法的AccessibleContext。可访问角色包括“复选框”，“菜单项”，“面板”等。这些角色由此类中的常量标识，例如 AccessibleRole.CHECK_BOX, AccessibleRole.MENU_ITEM, 和 AccessibleRole.PANEL 。此类中的常量表示常见对象角色的强类型枚举。故意省略了此类的公共构造函数，应用程序应使用此类的常量之一。尽管该类预定义了大量标准角色，但它是可扩展的，因此将来可以添加其他程序员定义的角色，而无需修改基类。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the concept of caller-provided channel binding information.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了调用者提供的通道绑定信息的概念。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the concept of caller-provided channel binding information. Channel bindings are used to strengthen the quality with which peer entity authentication is provided during context establishment. They enable the GSS-API callers to bind the establishment of the security context to relevant characteristics like addresses or to application specific data.
trans-unit.target: 该类封装了呼叫者提供的通道绑定信息的概念。通道绑定用于加强在建立上下文期间提供对等实体认证的质量。它们使GSS-API调用者能够将安全上下文的建立与地址等相关特征或与特定应用数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the logic of Namespace processing: it tracks the declarations currently in force for each context and automatically processes qualified XML names into their Namespace parts; it can also be used in reverse for generating XML qnames from Namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了Namespace处理的逻辑:它跟踪每个上下文当前有效的声明,并自动将合格的XML名称处理成它们的Namespace部分;它还可以反过来用于从Namespaces生成XML qnames。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the low-level machinery required to implement the asynchronous closing and interruption of channels. A concrete channel class must invoke the begin and end methods before and after, respectively, invoking an I/O operation that might block indefinitely. In order to ensure that the end method is always invoked, these methods should be used within a try ... finally block:
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了实现通道的异步关闭和中断所需的低级设备。具体的通道类必须分别在调用可能无限期阻塞的I / O操作之前和之后分别调用 begin 和 end 方法。为了确保始终调用 end 方法，应在 try ... finally 块内使用这些方法：

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the low-level machinery required to implement the asynchronous closing and interruption of channels. A concrete channel class must invoke the begin and end methods before and after, respectively, invoking an I/O operation that might block indefinitely. In order to ensure that the end method is always invoked, these methods should be used within a try ... finally block:
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了实现通道的异步关闭和中断所需的低级设备。具体的通道类必须分别在调用可能无限期阻塞的I / O操作之前和之后分别调用 begin 和 end 方法。为了确保始终调用 end 方法，应在 try ... finally 块内使用这些方法：

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the low-level machinery required to implement the interruption of selection operations. A concrete selector class must invoke the begin and end methods before and after, respectively, invoking an I/O operation that might block indefinitely. In order to ensure that the end method is always invoked, these methods should be used within a try ... finally block:
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了实现选择操作中断所需的低级机制。具体的选择器类必须分别在调用可能无限期阻塞的I / O操作之前和之后分别调用 begin 和 end 方法。为了确保始终调用 end 方法，应在 try ... finally 块内使用这些方法：

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the low-level machinery required to implement the interruption of selection operations. A concrete selector class must invoke the begin and end methods before and after, respectively, invoking an I/O operation that might block indefinitely. In order to ensure that the end method is always invoked, these methods should be used within a try ... finally block:
trans-unit.target: 此类封装了实现选择操作中断所需的低级机制。具体的选择器类必须分别在调用可能无限期阻塞的I / O操作之前和之后分别调用 begin 和 end 方法。为了确保始终调用 end 方法，应在 try ... finally 块内使用这些方法：

trans-unit.source: This class exists to wrap one or more data arrays.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的存在是为了封装一个或多个数据数组。

trans-unit.source: This class exists to wrap one or more data arrays. Each data array in the DataBuffer is referred to as a bank. Accessor methods for getting and setting elements of the DataBuffer's banks exist with and without a bank specifier. The methods without a bank specifier use the default 0th bank. The DataBuffer can optionally take an offset per bank, so that data in an existing array can be used even if the interesting data doesn't start at array location zero. Getting or setting the 0th element of a bank, uses the (0+offset)th element of the array. The size field specifies how much of the data array is available for use. Size + offset for a given bank should never be greater than the length of the associated data array. The data type of a data buffer indicates the type of the data array(s) and may also indicate additional semantics, e.g. storing unsigned 8-bit data in elements of a byte array. The data type may be TYPE_UNDEFINED or one of the types defined below. Other types may be added in the future. Generally, an object of class DataBuffer will be cast down to one of its data type specific subclasses to access data type specific methods for improved performance. Currently, the Java 2D(tm) API image classes use TYPE_BYTE, TYPE_USHORT, TYPE_INT, TYPE_SHORT, TYPE_FLOAT, and TYPE_DOUBLE DataBuffers to store image data.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的存在是为了包裹一个或多个数据数组。DataBuffer中的每个数据数组被称为bank。用于获取和设置DataBuffer的bank元素的Accessor方法有带bank指定符和不带bank指定符两种。没有bank指定符的方法使用默认的第0个bank。DataBuffer可以选择为每个bank取一个偏移量,这样即使有趣的数据不是从数组0开始,也可以使用现有数组中的数据。获取或设置bank的第0个元素,使用数组的(0+offset)th元素。大小字段指定了数据数组中有多少数据可以使用。一个给定库的大小+偏移量永远不应该大于相关数据数组的长度。数据缓冲区的数据类型表示数据数组的类型,也可以表示额外的语义,例如在字节数组的元素中存储无符号的8位数据。数据类型可以是TYPE_UNDEFINED或下面定义的类型之一。其他类型可能会在将来被添加。一般情况下,DataBuffer类的对象将被下放到它的一个特定数据类型的子类中,以访问特定数据类型的方法,从而提高性能。目前,Java 2D(tm)API图像类使用TYPE_BYTE、TYPE_USHORT、TYPE_INT、TYPE_SHORT、TYPE_FLOAT和TYPE_DOUBLE DataBuffers来存储图像数据。

trans-unit.source: This class expresses a Language Range defined in RFC 4647 Matching of Language Tags.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 4647语言标记匹配中定义的语言范围。

trans-unit.source: This class expresses a Language Range defined in RFC 4647 Matching of Language Tags. A language range is an identifier which is used to select language tag(s) meeting specific requirements by using the mechanisms described in Locale Matching. A list which represents a user's preferences and consists of language ranges is called a Language Priority List.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 4647语言标记匹配中定义的语言范围。语言范围是一种标识符，用于通过使用“ 语言环境匹配”中描述的机制来选择满足特定要求的语言标签。代表用户偏好并由语言范围组成的列表称为“ 语言优先级列表”。

trans-unit.source: This class expresses a Language Range defined in RFC 4647 Matching of Language Tags.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 4647语言标记匹配中定义的语言范围。

trans-unit.source: This class expresses a Language Range defined in RFC 4647 Matching of Language Tags. A language range is an identifier which is used to select language tag(s) meeting specific requirements by using the mechanisms described in Locale Matching. A list which represents a user's preferences and consists of language ranges is called a Language Priority List.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 4647语言标记匹配中定义的语言范围。语言范围是一种标识符，用于通过使用“语言环境匹配”中描述的机制来选择满足特定要求的语言标签。代表用户偏好并由语言范围组成的列表称为“语言优先级列表”。

trans-unit.source: This class extends Number, but does not define methods such as equals, hashCode and compareTo because instances are expected to be mutated, and so are not useful as collection keys.
trans-unit.target: 该类扩展 Number ，但并没有明确的方法，如 equals ， hashCode 和 compareTo 因为情况下预计将发生突变，所以不如收集钥匙有用。

trans-unit.source: This class extends Number, but does not define methods such as equals, hashCode and compareTo because instances are expected to be mutated, and so are not useful as collection keys.
trans-unit.target: 该类扩展 Number ，但并没有明确的方法，如 equals ， hashCode 和 compareTo 因为情况下预计将发生突变，所以不如收集钥匙有用。

trans-unit.source: This class extends PrintService and represents a print service that prints data in different formats to a client-provided output stream.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 PrintService ,并表示一种打印服务，该服务将不同格式的数据打印到客户端提供的输出流中。

trans-unit.source: This class extends PrintService and represents a print service that prints data in different formats to a client-provided output stream. This is principally intended for services where the output format is a document type suitable for viewing or archiving. The output format must be declared as a mime type. This is equivalent to an output document flavor where the representation class is always "java.io.OutputStream" An instance of the StreamPrintService class is obtained from a StreamPrintServiceFactory instance.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 PrintService ,并表示一种打印服务，该服务将不同格式的数据打印到客户端提供的输出流中。这主要用于输出格式为适合查看或归档的文档类型的服务。输出格式必须声明为mime类型。这等效于输出文档类，其中表示形式类始终为“ java.io.OutputStream” 。从 StreamPrintServiceFactory 实例获取 StreamPrintService 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally as bytes.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并在内部将数据存储为字节。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally as bytes. Values stored in the byte array(s) of this DataBuffer are treated as unsigned values.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并在内部将数据存储为字节。存储在此 DataBuffer 的字节数组中的值被视为无符号值。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally as integers.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并将数据内部存储为整数。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally as shorts.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并在内部将数据存储为short。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally as shorts. Values stored in the short array(s) of this DataBuffer are treated as unsigned values.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并在内部将数据存储为short。存储在此 DataBuffer 的短数组中的值被视为无符号值。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally in double form.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并以 double 精度形式在内部存储数据。

trans-unit.source: This class extends DataBuffer and stores data internally in float form.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 DataBuffer 并以 float 形式在内部存储数据。

trans-unit.source: This class extends NTSid and represents a Windows NT user's SID.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展 NTSid ,并表示Windows NT用户的SID。

trans-unit.source: This class extends NTSid and represents a Windows NT user's domain SID.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展 NTSid ,并表示Windows NT用户的域SID。

trans-unit.source: This class extends NTSid and represents a Windows NT user's primary group SID.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展 NTSid ,并表示Windows NT用户的主要组SID。

trans-unit.source: This class extends NTSid and represents one of the groups to which a Windows NT user belongs.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展 NTSid ,并表示Windows NT用户所属的组之一。

trans-unit.source: This class extends ServerSocket and provides secure server sockets using protocols such as the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展 ServerSocket 并使用诸如安全套接字层（SSL）或传输层安全性（TLS）协议之类的协议提供安全服务器套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class extends ServerSockets and provides secure server sockets using protocols such as the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展 ServerSocket 并使用诸如安全套接字层（SSL）或传输层安全性（TLS）协议之类的协议提供安全服务器套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class extends Socket and provides secure sockets using protocols such as the "Secure Sockets Layer" (SSL) or IETF "Transport Layer Security" (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 Socket ,并使用诸如“安全套接字层”（SSL）或IETF“传输层安全性”（TLS）协议之类的协议提供了安全套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class extends Sockets and provides secure socket using protocols such as the "Secure Sockets Layer" (SSL) or IETF "Transport Layer Security" (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 Socket 并使用诸如“安全套接字层”（SSL）或IETF“传输层安全性”（TLS）协议之类的协议提供安全套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class extends ThreadLocal to provide inheritance of values from parent thread to child thread: when a child thread is created, the child receives initial values for all inheritable thread-local variables for which the parent has values.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 ThreadLocal ,以提供从父线程到子线程的值继承：创建子线程时，子级将为父级具有值的所有可继承线程局部变量接收初始值。

trans-unit.source: This class extends ThreadLocal to provide inheritance of values from parent thread to child thread: when a child thread is created, the child receives initial values for all inheritable thread-local variables for which the parent has values. Normally the child's values will be identical to the parent's; however, the child's value can be made an arbitrary function of the parent's by overriding the childValue method in this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 ThreadLocal ,以提供从父线程到子线程的值继承：创建子线程时，子级将为父级具有值的所有可继承线程局部变量接收初始值。通常，孩子的价值观将与父母的价值观相同。但是，通过覆盖 childValue 中的childValue方法，可以使子级的值成为父级的任意函数。

trans-unit.source: This class extends javax.management.MBeanFeatureInfo and thus provides name and description fields. The name field should be the fully qualified Java class name of the notification objects described by this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了 javax.management.MBeanFeatureInfo ，因此提供了 name 和 description 字段。该 name 字段应该是这个类中描述的通知对象的完全合格的Java类名。

trans-unit.source: This class extends ClassLoader with additional support for defining classes with an associated code source and permissions which are retrieved by the system policy by default.
trans-unit.target: 这个类扩展了ClassLoader,额外支持定义具有相关代码源和权限的类,这些权限默认由系统策略检索。

trans-unit.source: This class extends Raster to provide pixel writing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 该类扩展了Raster来提供像素写入功能。

trans-unit.source: This class extends Raster to provide pixel writing capabilities. Refer to the class comment for Raster for descriptions of how a Raster stores pixels.
trans-unit.target: 该类对Raster进行了扩展,以提供像素写入功能。关于Raster如何存储像素的描述,请参考Raster的类注释。

trans-unit.source: This class extends TransformerFactory to provide SAX-specific factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个类扩展了TransformerFactory来提供SAX特定的工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: This class extends TransformerFactory to provide SAX-specific factory methods. It provides two types of ContentHandlers, one for creating Transformers, the other for creating Templates objects.
trans-unit.target: 这个类扩展了TransformerFactory来提供SAX特定的工厂方法。它提供了两种类型的ContentHandlers,一种用于创建Transformer,另一种用于创建Template对象。

trans-unit.source: This class extends the SAX2 base handler class to support the SAX2 LexicalHandler, DeclHandler, and EntityResolver2 extensions.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了SAX2基本处理程序类，以支持SAX2 LexicalHandler ， DeclHandler 和 EntityResolver2 扩展。

trans-unit.source: This class extends the SAX2 base handler class to support the SAX2 LexicalHandler, DeclHandler, and EntityResolver2 extensions. Except for overriding the original SAX1 resolveEntity() method the added handler methods just return. Subclassers may override everything on a method-by-method basis.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了SAX2基本处理程序类，以支持SAX2 LexicalHandler ， DeclHandler 和 EntityResolver2 扩展。除了覆盖原始的SAX1 resolveEntity() 方法之外，添加的处理程序方法只是返回。子类可以按方法覆盖所有内容。

trans-unit.source: This class extends the basic ImageFilter Class to scale an existing image and provide a source for a new image containing the resampled image. The pixels in the source image are blended to produce pixels for an image of the specified size. The blending process is analogous to scaling up the source image to a multiple of the destination size using pixel replication and then scaling it back down to the destination size by simply averaging all the pixels in the supersized image that fall within a given pixel of the destination image. If the data from the source is not delivered in TopDownLeftRight order then the filter will back off to a simple pixel replication behavior and utilize the requestTopDownLeftRightResend() method to refilter the pixels in a better way at the end.
trans-unit.target: 该类扩展了基本的ImageFilter类,用于缩放现有的图像,并为包含重采样图像的新图像提供源。源图像中的像素被混合以产生指定大小的图像像素。混合过程类似于使用像素复制将源图像放大到目标尺寸的倍数,然后通过简单地平均超大图像中落在目标图像的给定像素内的所有像素,将其缩小到目标尺寸。如果来自源图像的数据没有按照TopDownLeftRight的顺序传递,那么过滤器将退回到一个简单的像素复制行为,并利用requestTopDownLeftRightResend()方法在最后以更好的方式重新过滤像素。

trans-unit.source: This class extends the concept of a codebase to encapsulate not only the location (URL) but also the certificate chains that were used to verify signed code originating from that location.
trans-unit.target: 这个类扩展了代码库的概念,不仅封装了位置(URL),还封装了用于验证源自该位置的签名代码的证书链。

trans-unit.source: This class extends the standard equations defined by Porter and Duff to include one additional factor. An instance of the AlphaComposite class can contain an alpha value that is used to modify the opacity or coverage of every source pixel before it is used in the blending equations.
trans-unit.target: 此类扩展了Porter和Duff定义的标准方程式，以包括一个附加因子。 AlphaComposite 类的实例可以包含一个alpha值，该值用于在混合方程式中使用它之前修改每个源像素的不透明度或覆盖率。

trans-unit.source: This class handles conversion from the local time-line of LocalDateTime to the instant time-line of Instant. The difference between the two time-lines is the offset from UTC/Greenwich, represented by a ZoneOffset.
trans-unit.target: 此类处理从 LocalDateTime 的本地时间线到 Instant 的即时时间线的转换。两条时间线之间的差异是相对于UTC /格林威治的偏移量，由 ZoneOffset 表示。

trans-unit.source: This class handles the renderable aspects of an operation with help from its associated instance of a ContextualRenderedImageFactory.
trans-unit.target: 该类在其关联的ContextualRenderedImageFactory实例的帮助下处理操作的可渲染方面。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated and should no longer be used. The basis of the various TextUI implementations can be found in the javax.swing.plaf.basic package and the class BasicTextUI replaces this class.
trans-unit.target: 这个类已经被废弃,不应该再被使用。各种TextUI实现的基础可以在javax.swing.plaf.basic包中找到,BasicTextUI类取代了这个类。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 该类已被废弃。

trans-unit.source: This class has been obsoleted by the 1.4 focus APIs.
trans-unit.target: 这个类已经被1.4的focus API所淘汰。

trans-unit.source: This class has been obsoleted by the 1.4 focus APIs. While client code may still use this class, developers are strongly encouraged to use java.awt.KeyboardFocusManager and java.awt.DefaultKeyboardFocusManager instead.
trans-unit.target: 该类已被1.4焦点API淘汰。尽管客户端代码仍可以使用此类，但强烈建议开发人员改用 java.awt.KeyboardFocusManager 和 java.awt.DefaultKeyboardFocusManager 。

trans-unit.source: This class has one tuning parameter (which affects performance but not semantics):
trans-unit.target: 这个类有一个调整参数(影响性能但不影响语义)。

trans-unit.source: This class has the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 该类具有以下属性。

trans-unit.source: This class holds a small number of attributes in an array.
trans-unit.target: 这个类在一个数组中容纳了少量的属性。

trans-unit.source: This class holds a small number of attributes in an array. The storage format is key, value, key, value, etc. The size of the set is the length of the array divided by two. By default, this is the class that will be used to store attributes when held in the compact sharable form.
trans-unit.target: 该类以数组的形式存放少量的属性。存储格式为key、value、key、value等。集的大小是数组的长度除以二。默认情况下,当以紧凑的可共享形式保存属性时,将使用该类来存储属性。

trans-unit.source: This class ignores PropertyChangeEvents whose source is not the JFormattedTextField, so subclasses may safely make thisDefaultEditor a PropertyChangeListener on other objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类忽略其来源不是 JFormattedTextField 的 PropertyChangeEvents ，因此子类可以安全地 this DefaultEditor 设置为其他对象上的 PropertyChangeListener 。

trans-unit.source: This class implementation retrieves and makes available NT security information for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现检索并提供当前用户的NT安全信息。

trans-unit.source: This class implementation retrieves and makes available Unix UID/GID/groups information for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的实现可以检索并提供当前用户的Unix UID/GID/群组信息。

trans-unit.source: This class implements TemporalAccessor rather than Temporal. This is because it is not possible to define whether February 29th is valid or not without external information, preventing the implementation of plus/minus. Related to this, MonthDay only provides access to query and set the fields MONTH_OF_YEAR and DAY_OF_MONTH.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现 TemporalAccessor 而不是 Temporal 。这是因为在没有外部信息的情况下无法定义2月29日是否有效，从而妨碍了正负的实现。与此相关的是， MonthDay 仅提供查询访问权限并设置字段 MONTH_OF_YEAR 和 DAY_OF_MONTH 。

trans-unit.source: This class implements RMIClientSocketFactory over the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 此类通过安全套接字层（SSL）或传输层安全性（TLS）协议实现 RMIClientSocketFactory 。

trans-unit.source: This class implements RMIServerSocketFactory over the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 此类通过安全套接字层（SSL）或传输层安全性（TLS）协议实现 RMIServerSocketFactory 。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a character buffer that can be used as a character-input stream.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了一个可以作为字符输入流的字符缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a character buffer that can be used as an Writer.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了一个可以作为Writer使用的字符缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a character buffer that can be used as an Writer. The buffer automatically grows when data is written to the stream. The data can be retrieved using toCharArray() and toString().
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一个可以作为Writer使用的字符缓冲区。当数据被写入流时,缓冲区会自动增长。可以使用toCharArray()和toString()来检索数据。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a concurrent variant of SkipLists providing expected average
trans-unit.target: 此类实现了SkipLists的并发变体，提供了预期的平均值

trans-unit.source: This class implements a concurrent variant of SkipLists providing expected average
trans-unit.target: 此类实现了SkipLists的并发变体，提供了预期的平均值

trans-unit.source: This class implements a convolution from the source to the destination.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了从源到目的的卷积。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a convolution from the source to the destination. Convolution using a convolution kernel is a spatial operation that computes the output pixel from an input pixel by multiplying the kernel with the surround of the input pixel. This allows the output pixel to be affected by the immediate neighborhood in a way that can be mathematically specified with a kernel.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了从源到目的的卷积。使用卷积核的卷积是一种空间操作,它通过将核与输入像素的环绕相乘来计算输入像素的输出像素。这样,输出像素就可以以一种可以用内核在数学上指定的方式受到近邻的影响。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a decoder for decoding byte data using the Base64 encoding scheme as specified in RFC 4648 and RFC 2045.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一个解码器,用于使用 RFC 4648 和 RFC 2045 中指定的 Base64 编码方案对字节数据进行解码。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a deprecated interface, AttributeList; that interface has been replaced by Attributes, which is implemented in the AttributesImpl helper class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现一个不推荐使用的接口 AttributeList ；该接口已被 Attributes 取代，该 AttributesImpl 在AttributesImpl helper类中实现。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a filter for the set of interface methods that are used to deliver data from an ImageProducer to an ImageConsumer.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一组接口方法的过滤器,这些接口方法用于将数据从ImageProducer传递给ImageConsumer。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a filter for the set of interface methods that are used to deliver data from an ImageProducer to an ImageConsumer. It is meant to be used in conjunction with a FilteredImageSource object to produce filtered versions of existing images. It is a base class that provides the calls needed to implement a "Null filter" which has no effect on the data being passed through. Filters should subclass this class and override the methods which deal with the data that needs to be filtered and modify it as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一组接口方法的过滤器,这些接口方法用于从ImageProducer向ImageConsumer传递数据。它与FilteredImageSource对象一起使用,以产生现有图像的过滤版本。它是一个基类,提供了实现 "Null filter "所需的调用,该类对所传递的数据没有影响。过滤器应该子类化这个类,并覆盖处理需要过滤的数据的方法,并在必要时对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a hash table, which maps keys to values.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了一个哈希表,它将键映射到值。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a hash table, which maps keys to values. Any non-null object can be used as a key or as a value.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现哈希表，该哈希表将键映射到值。任何非 null 对象都可以用作键或值。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a locking mechanism for the document. It allows multiple readers or one writer, and writers must wait until all observers of the document have been notified of a previous change before beginning another mutation to the document. The read lock is acquired and released using the render method. A write lock is acquired by the methods that mutate the document, and are held for the duration of the method call. Notification is done on the thread that produced the mutation, and the thread has full read access to the document for the duration of the notification, but other readers are kept out until the notification has finished. The notification is a beans event notification which does not allow any further mutations until all listeners have been notified.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现了文档的锁定机制。它允许多个读者或一个作者，并且作家必须等到文档的所有观察者都收到有关先前更改的通知后，才能开始对该文档进行另一种更改。使用 render 方法获取并释放读取锁。更改文档的方法会获得写锁，并且在方法调用期间将保持该写锁。通知是在产生突变的线程上完成的，并且在通知期间，该线程具有对文档的完全读取访问权限，但其他读取器将一直保留到通知完成为止。该通知是bean事件通知，在通知所有侦听器之前，不允许进行任何进一步的更改。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a lookup operation from the source to the destination.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了从源到目的的查找操作。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a lookup operation from the source to the destination. The LookupTable object may contain a single array or multiple arrays, subject to the restrictions below.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了从源到目的的查找操作。LookupTable对象可以包含一个数组或多个数组,但受以下限制。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a simple HTTP server.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了一个简单的HTTP服务器。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a simple HTTP server. A HttpServer is bound to an IP address and port number and listens for incoming TCP connections from clients on this address. The sub-class HttpsServer implements a server which handles HTTPS requests.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现一个简单的HTTP服务器。HttpServer绑定到IP地址和端口号，并侦听此地址上来自客户端的传入TCP连接。子类 HttpsServer 实现了一个处理HTTPS请求的服务器。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a stream filter for reading compressed data in the GZIP file format.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一个流过滤器,用于读取GZIP文件格式的压缩数据。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a stream filter for uncompressing data in the "deflate" compression format.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一个流过滤器,用于解压 "deflate "压缩格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a stream filter for uncompressing data in the "deflate" compression format. It is also used as the basis for other decompression filters, such as GZIPInputStream.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一个流过滤器,用于解压 "deflate "压缩格式的数据。它也被用作其他解压过滤器的基础,如GZIPInputStream。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a stream filter for writing compressed data in the GZIP file format.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了一个流过滤器,用于写入GZIP文件格式的压缩数据。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a vector of bits that grows as needed.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了一个根据需要增长的比特向量。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a vector of bits that grows as needed. Each component of the bit set has a boolean value. The bits of a BitSet are indexed by nonnegative integers. Individual indexed bits can be examined, set, or cleared. One BitSet may be used to modify the contents of another BitSet through logical AND, logical inclusive OR, and logical exclusive OR operations.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现根据需要增长的位向量。位集合的每个分量都有一个 boolean 值。 BitSet 的位由非负整数索引。可以检查，设置或清除各个索引位。一个 BitSet 可用于通过逻辑AND，逻辑包含OR和逻辑异或运算来修改另一个 BitSet 的内容。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support appropriate for list children.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了对列表子类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for List children.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了对List儿童的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for List children. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to list children user-interface elements.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了对List子类的可访问性支持。它提供了一个适用于列表子类用户界面元素的Java Accessibility API的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the AbstractButton class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 AbstractButton 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the AbstractButton class. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to button and menu item user-interface elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 AbstractButton 类的可访问性支持。它提供了适用于按钮和菜单项用户界面元素的Java Accessibility API的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Applet class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Applet 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Applet class. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to applet user-interface elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Applet 类的可访问性支持。它提供了适用于applet用户界面元素的Java Accessibility API的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Box.Filler class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现 Box.Filler 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Box class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现 Box 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Button class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Button 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Button class. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to button user-interface elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Button 类的可访问性支持。它提供了适用于按钮用户界面元素的Java Accessibility API的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Canvas class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Canvas 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Canvas class. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to canvas user-interface elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Canvas 类的可访问性支持。它提供了适用于画布用户界面元素的Java Accessibility API的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the CellRendererPane class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 CellRendererPane 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Checkbox class.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Checkbox 类的可访问性支持。

trans-unit.source: This class implements accessibility support for the Checkbox class. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to checkbox user-interface elements.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现对 Checkbox 类的可访问性支持。它提供了适用于复选框用户界面元素的Java Accessibility API的实现。
