trans-unit.source: This class is generally a fall back method for dealing with images. More efficient code will cast the SampleModel to the appropriate subclass and extract the information needed to directly manipulate pixels in the DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 这个类一般是处理图像的后备方法。更高效的代码会将SampleModel投向适当的子类,并提取直接操作DataBuffer中像素所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class is immutable and thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是不可变的,线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: This class is immutable.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是不可改变的。

trans-unit.source: This class is implemented by a service and located by the implementation using the SPI JAR File specification.
trans-unit.target: 该类由服务实现,并由实现使用SPI JAR文件规范定位。

trans-unit.source: This class is implemented by a service and located by the implementation using the ServiceLoader facility.
trans-unit.target: 此类由服务实现，并由使用 ServiceLoader 工具的实现定位。

trans-unit.source: This class is implemented to do the extra work necessary to work properly in the presence of multiple threads (i.e. from asynchronous notification of model changes for example) by ensuring that all component access is done on the event thread.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的实现是为了在多线程存在的情况下,通过确保所有组件的访问都在事件线程上完成,来完成必要的额外工作(例如从异步通知模型变化)。

trans-unit.source: This class is implemented to provide a default behavior of transferring a component property simply by specifying the name of the property in the constructor. For example, to transfer the foreground color from one component to another either via the clipboard or a drag and drop operation a TransferHandler can be constructed with the string "foreground". The built in support will use the color returned by getForeground as the source of the transfer, and setForeground for the target of a transfer.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实现是为了提供默认的行为，即只需在构造函数中指定属性的名称即可传输组件属性。例如，要通过剪贴板或拖放操作将前景色从一个组件传输到另一个组件，可以使用字符串“ foreground”构造 TransferHandler 。内置支持将使用 getForeground 返回的颜色作为传输源，并使用 setForeground 作为传输目标。

trans-unit.source: This class is in conformance with Level 1 of Unicode Technical Standard #18: Unicode Regular Expression, plus RL2.1 Canonical Equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 此类符合Unicode技术标准＃18的级别1 ：Unicode正则表达式以及RL2.1规范等效项。

trans-unit.source: This class is in conformance with Level 1 of Unicode Technical Standard #18: Unicode Regular Expression, plus RL2.1 Canonical Equivalents and RL2.2 Extended Grapheme Clusters.
trans-unit.target: 此类符合Unicode技术标准＃18的1级：Unicode正则表达式，以及RL2.1标准规范和RL2.2扩展字素簇。

trans-unit.source: This class is inserted in between cell renderers and the components that use them.
trans-unit.target: 这个类被插入到单元格渲染器和使用它们的组件之间。

trans-unit.source: This class is inserted in between cell renderers and the components that use them. It just exists to thwart the repaint() and invalidate() methods which would otherwise propagate up the tree when the renderer was configured. It's used by the implementations of JTable, JTree, and JList. For example, here's how CellRendererPane is used in the code the paints each row in a JList:
trans-unit.target: 这个类被插入到单元格渲染器和使用它们的组件之间。它的存在只是为了阻挠repaint()和invalidate()方法,否则当渲染器被配置时,这些方法会在树上传播。它被JTable、JTree和JList的实现所使用。例如,下面是CellRendererPane在JList中绘制每一行的代码中是如何使用的。

trans-unit.source: This class is intended for use in a single thread.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是为了在单线程中使用。

trans-unit.source: This class is intended primarily for use with key objects whose equals methods test for object identity using the == operator. Once such a key is discarded it can never be recreated, so it is impossible to do a lookup of that key in a WeakHashMap at some later time and be surprised that its entry has been removed. This class will work perfectly well with key objects whose equals methods are not based upon object identity, such as String instances. With such recreatable key objects, however, the automatic removal of WeakHashMap entries whose keys have been discarded may prove to be confusing.
trans-unit.target: 此类主要用于其 equals 方法使用 == 运算符测试对象标识的关键对象。一旦丢弃了这样的密钥，就永远无法重新创建它，因此以后无法在 WeakHashMap 中对该密钥进行查找，并且会惊讶地发现它的条目已被删除。此类将与其 equals 方法不基于对象标识的键对象（例如 String 实例）完美配合。但是，使用此类可重新创建的键对象，自动删除其键已被丢弃的 WeakHashMap 条目可能会造成混淆。

trans-unit.source: This class is mostly for library writers presenting stream views of data structures; most static stream methods intended for end users are in the various Stream classes.
trans-unit.target: 该课程主要是为图书馆作者提供数据结构的流视图的。面向最终用户的大多数静态流方法都在各种 Stream 类中。

trans-unit.source: This class is multi-threading safe and can be used by multiple threads concurrently. However, this object keeps track of the card presence state of each of its terminals. Multiple objects should be used if independent calls to waitForChange() are required.
trans-unit.target: 此类是多线程安全的，并且可以同时由多个线程使用。但是，此对象跟踪其每个终端的卡存在状态。如果需要独立调用waitForChange（），则应使用多个对象。

trans-unit.source: This class is never instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 这个类永远不会被实例化。

trans-unit.source: This class is no longer used or needed.
trans-unit.target: 这个类不再使用或需要。

trans-unit.source: This class is no longer used or needed. java.awt.Component.AccessibleAWTComponent provides the same functionality and it is handled in Component.
trans-unit.target: 不再使用或需要此类。 java.awt.Component.AccessibleAWTComponent 提供相同的功能，并在 Component 中进行处理。

trans-unit.source: This class is no longer used.
trans-unit.target: 这类人不再使用。

trans-unit.source: This class is no longer used. Its functionality has been replaced by java.security.KeyStore, the java.security.cert package, and java.security.Principal.
trans-unit.target: 此类不再使用。其功能已由 java.security.KeyStore ， java.security.cert 包和 java.security.Principal 取代。

trans-unit.source: This class is normally used as the parent of JInternalFrames to provide a pluggable DesktopManager object to the JInternalFrames. The installUI of the L&F specific implementation is responsible for setting the desktopManager variable appropriately. When the parent of a JInternalFrame is a JDesktopPane, it should delegate most of its behavior to the desktopManager (closing, resizing, etc).
trans-unit.target: 这个类通常被用作父 JInternalFrames 提供一个可插入 DesktopManager 对象到 JInternalFrames 。L＆F特定实现的 installUI 负责适当地设置 desktopManager 变量。当 JInternalFrame 的父级是 JDesktopPane 时，应将其大部分行为委托给 desktopManager （关闭，调整大小等）。

trans-unit.source: This class is not intended to be used for general XML processing. In particular, Element nodes created within the Image I/O API are not compatible with those created by Sun's standard implementation of the org.w3.dom API. In particular, the implementation is tuned for simple uses and may not perform well for intensive processing.
trans-unit.target: 此类不应用于常规XML处理。特别是，在Image I / O API中创建的 Element 节点与Sun的 org.w3.dom API 标准实现所创建的Element节点不兼容。特别是，该实现已针对简单用途进行了调整，对于密集处理可能效果不佳。

trans-unit.source: This class is not thread safe, except as noted, all access should be through a single thread.
trans-unit.target: 这个类不是线程安全的,除了注意,所有的访问都应该通过单线程。

trans-unit.source: This class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 这个班级已经过时了。

trans-unit.source: This class is obsolete. Use ExportException instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类已过时。请改用 ExportException 。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects that store a 2D coordinate. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维坐标的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects that store a 2D dimension. The actual storage representation of the sizes is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维尺寸的对象的抽象超类。尺寸的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects that store a 2D line segment. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维线段的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects that store a 2D quadratic curve segment. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维二次曲线段的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects that store a 2D rectangle. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维矩形的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects which store a 2D cubic curve segment. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维立体曲线段的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is only the abstract superclass for all objects which store a 2D ellipse. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只是所有存储二维椭圆的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示留给了子类。

trans-unit.source: This class is only useful for raw secret keys that can be represented as a byte array and have no key parameters associated with them, e.g., DES or Triple DES keys.
trans-unit.target: 这个类只对原始秘钥有用,这些秘钥可以用字节数组表示,并且没有与之相关的密钥参数,例如,DES或Triple DES密钥。

trans-unit.source: This class is part of the service provider interface and not accessed directly by applications. Applications should use TerminalFactory objects, which can be obtained by calling one of the TerminalFactory.getInstance() methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类是服务提供者界面的一部分，不能由应用程序直接访问。应用程序应使用TerminalFactory对象，可以通过调用TerminalFactory.getInstance（）方法之一来获取这些对象。

trans-unit.source: This class is protected so that it can be subclassed by other look and feels to implement their own mouse handling behavior. All overridden methods should call the parent methods so that the menu selection is correct.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是受保护的,所以它可以被其他外观和感觉子类来实现自己的鼠标处理行为。所有的重写方法都应该调用父方法,这样菜单选择才是正确的。

trans-unit.source: This class is separated from the Chronology interface so that the static methods are not inherited. While Chronology can be implemented directly, it is strongly recommended to extend this abstract class instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类与 Chronology 接口分开，因此不会继承静态方法。虽然可以直接实现 Chronology ，但强烈建议改为扩展此抽象类。

trans-unit.source: This class is serializable. When it is serialized it will save (and restore) any listeners that are themselves serializable. Any non-serializable listeners will be skipped during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是可序列化的。当它被序列化时,它将保存(并恢复)任何本身是可序列化的监听器。任何不可序列化的监听器将在序列化过程中被跳过。

trans-unit.source: This class is the LayoutManager for it's single JFormattedTextField child. By default the child is just centered with the parents insets.
trans-unit.target: 此类是 LayoutManager ,因为它是单个 JFormattedTextField 子级。默认情况下，孩子只是与父母插图居中。

trans-unit.source: This class is the abstract superclass for all objects that store a 2D rounded rectangle. The actual storage representation of the coordinates is left to the subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该类是所有存储二维圆角矩形的对象的抽象超类。坐标的实际存储表示交由子类来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class is the abstract superclass of all actual implementations of the Abstract Window Toolkit.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是抽象窗口工具箱所有实际实现的抽象超类。

trans-unit.source: This class is the abstract superclass of all actual implementations of the Abstract Window Toolkit. Subclasses of the Toolkit class are used to bind the various components to particular native toolkit implementations.
trans-unit.target: 此类是Abstract Window Toolkit的所有实际实现的抽象超类。 Toolkit 类的子类用于将各种组件绑定到特定的本机Toolkit实现。

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class for DragSourceDragEvent and DragSourceDropEvent.
trans-unit.target: 此类是 DragSourceDragEvent 和 DragSourceDropEvent 的基类。

trans-unit.source: This class is the base interface for hostname verification.
trans-unit.target: 该类是主机名验证的基础接口。

trans-unit.source: This class is the base interface for providing algorithm-specific information to a KeyManagerFactory or TrustManagerFactory.
trans-unit.target: 该类是为KeyManagerFactory或TrustManagerFactory提供特定算法信息的基础接口。

trans-unit.source: This class is the implementation of a ModelMBean.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是ModelMBean的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class is the implementation of a ModelMBean. An appropriate implementation of a ModelMBean must be shipped with every JMX Agent and the class must be named RequiredModelMBean.
trans-unit.target: 该类是ModelMBean的实现。ModelMBean 的适当实现必须与每个 JMX 代理一起提供,并且该类必须命名为 RequiredModelMBean。

trans-unit.source: This class is the interface to be implemented by MBeans that are meant to be persistent.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是由MBeans实现的接口,目的是为了持久化。

trans-unit.source: This class is the interface to be implemented by MBeans that are meant to be persistent. MBeans supporting this interface should call the load method during construction in order to prime the MBean from the persistent store. In the case of a ModelMBean, the store method should be called by the MBeanServer based on the descriptors in the ModelMBean or by the MBean itself during normal processing of the ModelMBean.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是要被持久化的MBeans实现的接口。支持这个接口的MBeans应该在构造过程中调用加载方法,以便从持久化存储中给MBean填料。在ModelMBean的情况下,存储方法应该由MBeanServer根据ModelMBean中的描述符来调用,或者由MBean本身在正常处理ModelMBean时调用。

trans-unit.source: This class is the opposite of the AbstractList class in the sense that it implements the "random access" methods (get(int index), set(int index, E element), add(int index, E element) and remove(int index)) on top of the list's list iterator, instead of the other way around.
trans-unit.target: 在实现“随机访问”方法（ get(int index) ， set(int index, E element) ， add(int index, E element) 和 remove(int index) ）的意义上，此类与 AbstractList 类相反。））放在列表​​的列表迭代器的顶部，而不是相反。

trans-unit.source: This class is the starting context for performing LDAPv3-style extended operations and controls.
trans-unit.target: 该类是执行LDAPv3风格扩展操作和控制的起始上下文。

trans-unit.source: This class is the starting context for performing directory operations.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是执行目录操作的起始上下文。

trans-unit.source: This class is the starting context for performing directory operations. The documentation in the class description of InitialContext (including those for synchronization) apply here.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是执行目录操作的起始上下文。InitialContext类描述中的文档(包括同步的文档)适用于这里。

trans-unit.source: This class is the starting context for performing naming operations.
trans-unit.target: 该类是执行命名操作的起始上下文。

trans-unit.source: This class is the superclass of all classes that filter output streams.
trans-unit.target: 该类是所有过滤输出流的类的超类。

trans-unit.source: This class is the superclass of all classes that filter output streams. These streams sit on top of an already existing output stream (the
trans-unit.target: 这个类是所有过滤输出流的类的超类。这些流位于已经存在的输出流之上(该类的

trans-unit.source: This class is the superclass of any exception which can be raised during relation management.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是在关系管理过程中可以引发的任何异常的超类。

trans-unit.source: This class is thread-safe: multiple threads can share a single Properties object without the need for external synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 此类是线程安全的：多个线程可以共享一个 Properties 对象，而无需外部同步。

trans-unit.source: This class is thread-safe: multiple threads can share a single Timer object without the need for external synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 此类是线程安全的：多个线程可以共享一个 Timer 对象，而无需外部同步。

trans-unit.source: This class is thrown when an attempt is made to add to an attribute a value that conflicts with the attribute's schema definition.
trans-unit.target: 当试图向属性添加一个与属性的模式定义相冲突的值时,会抛出这个类。

trans-unit.source: This class is thrown when an attempt is made to add to an attribute a value that conflicts with the attribute's schema definition. This could happen, for example, if attempting to add an attribute with no value when the attribute is required to have at least one value, or if attempting to add more than one value to a single valued-attribute, or if attempting to add a value that conflicts with the syntax of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当试图向一个属性添加一个与该属性的模式定义相冲突的值时,就会抛出这个类。例如,如果试图添加一个没有值的属性,而该属性被要求至少有一个值,或者试图向一个有值的属性添加一个以上的值,或者试图添加一个与属性语法冲突的值,就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as an opaque representation of cryptographic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这个类用来作为加密参数的不透明表示。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by an LdapDnsProvider to return the result of a DNS lookup for a given LDAP URL. The result consists of a domain name and its associated ldap server endpoints.
trans-unit.target: LdapDnsProvider 使用此类来返回给定LDAP URL的DNS查找结果。结果由域名及其关联的ldap服务器端点组成。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the driver behind the scenes when the method getObject is called on an SQL structured or distinct type that has a custom mapping; a programmer never invokes SQLInputImpl methods directly. They are provided here as a convenience for those who write RowSet implementations.
trans-unit.target: 当在具有自定义映射关系的SQL结构化或不同类型上调用 getObject 方法时，驱动程序将在后台使用此类。程序员从不直接调用 SQLInputImpl 方法。为方便编写 RowSet 实现的人员，在此处提供了它们。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to allow multiple resources declarations.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于允许多资源声明。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to associate an emitted notification with the listener ID to which it is targeted.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于将发出的通知与它所针对的监听器ID关联起来。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to configure the https parameters for each incoming https connection on a HttpsServer.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于为HttpsServer上的每个传入的https连接配置https参数。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to configure the https parameters for each incoming https connection on a HttpsServer. Applications need to override the configure(HttpsParameters) method in order to change the default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于为HttpsServer上的每个传入https连接配置https参数。应用程序需要重写 configure(HttpsParameters) 方法以更改默认配置。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create a multiple-exclusion scope for a set of buttons.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于为一组按钮创建一个多重排除范围。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create a multiple-exclusion scope for a set of buttons. Creating a set of buttons with the same ButtonGroup object means that turning "on" one of those buttons turns off all other buttons in the group.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于为一组按钮创建多重排除作用域。使用相同的 ButtonGroup 对象创建一组按钮意味着将这些按钮之一“打开”会关闭组中的所有其他按钮。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create operating system processes.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于创建操作系统进程。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to explicitly specify the value for encoding input P in OAEP Padding.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于明确指定OAEP Padding中编码输入P的值。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to generate native system input events for the purposes of test automation, self-running demos, and other applications where control of the mouse and keyboard is needed.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于生成本地系统输入事件,用于测试自动化、自运行演示和其他需要控制鼠标和键盘的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to generate native system input events for the purposes of test automation, self-running demos, and other applications where control of the mouse and keyboard is needed. The primary purpose of Robot is to facilitate automated testing of Java platform implementations.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于生成本机系统输入事件,用于测试自动化、自运行演示以及其他需要控制鼠标和键盘的应用。Robot的主要目的是促进Java平台实现的自动化测试。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the transfer of a Transferable to and from Swing components.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于处理往返于Swing组件的 Transferable 的传输。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the transfer of a Transferable to and from Swing components. The Transferable is used to represent data that is exchanged via a cut, copy, or paste to/from a clipboard. It is also used in drag-and-drop operations to represent a drag from a component, and a drop to a component. Swing provides functionality that automatically supports cut, copy, and paste keyboard bindings that use the functionality provided by an implementation of this class. Swing also provides functionality that automatically supports drag and drop that uses the functionality provided by an implementation of this class. The Swing developer can concentrate on specifying the semantics of a transfer primarily by setting the transferHandler property on a Swing component.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于处理往返于Swing组件的 Transferable 的传输。该 Transferable 被用来表示通过切割交换的数据，复制，或从剪贴板粘贴到/。在拖放操作中也使用它来表示从组件的拖动以及到组件的拖放。Swing提供的功能自动支持剪切，复制和粘贴键盘绑定，这些绑定使用此类实现的功能。Swing还提供了自动支持拖放的功能，该功能使用此类的实现提供的功能。Swing开发人员可以主要通过设置 transferHandler 来专注于指定传输的语义 Swing组件上的属性。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to maintain a strongly typed enumeration. It is the super class of both the AccessibleRole and AccessibleState classes. Programmers normally do not interact with this class directly, but will instead use the AccessibleRole and AccessibleState classes.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于维护强类型枚举。它是AccessibleRole和AccessibleState类的超类。程序员通常不直接与此类进行交互，而是使用AccessibleRole和AccessibleState类。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to protect Kerberos services and the credentials necessary to access those services.
trans-unit.target: 这个类用来保护 Kerberos 服务和访问这些服务所需的凭证。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to protect Kerberos services and the credentials necessary to access those services. There is a one to one mapping of a service principal and the credentials necessary to access the service. Therefore granting access to a service principal implicitly grants access to the credential necessary to establish a security context with the service principal. This applies regardless of whether the credentials are in a cache or acquired via an exchange with the KDC. The credential can be either a ticket granting ticket, a service ticket or a secret key from a key table.
trans-unit.target: 这个类用来保护 Kerberos 服务和访问这些服务所需的凭证。服务委托人和访问服务所需的凭证之间存在着一对一的映射。因此,授予对服务委托人的访问权,就意味着授予对与服务委托人建立安全上下文所需凭证的访问权。无论凭证是在缓存中还是通过与 KDC 的交换获得,这都适用。凭证可以是授予凭证的票据、服务票据,也可以是密钥表中的秘钥。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to protect access to private Credentials belonging to a particular Subject.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于保护对属于特定 Subject 的私有凭据的访问。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to protect access to private Credentials belonging to a particular Subject. The Subject is represented by a Set of Principals.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于保护对属于特定 Subject 的私有凭据的访问。本 Subject 由一组校长表示。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to protect various attributes of an established GSS security context that can be accessed using the ExtendedGSSContext.inquireSecContext(com.sun.security.jgss.InquireType) method.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于保护已建立的GSS安全上下文的各种属性，这些属性可以使用 ExtendedGSSContext.inquireSecContext(com.sun.security.jgss.InquireType) 方法进行访问。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to provide necessary configuration parameters (server name and port number) to implementations of the LDAP CertStore algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于为LDAP CertStore 算法的实现提供必要的配置参数（服务器名称和端口号）。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to provide necessary configuration parameters (server name and port number) to implementations of the LDAP CertStore algorithm. However, if you are retrieving certificates or CRLs from an ldap URI as specified by RFC 5280, use the URICertStoreParameters instead as the URI may contain additional information such as the distinguished name that will help the LDAP CertStore find the specific certificates and CRLs.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于为LDAP CertStore 算法的实现提供必要的配置参数（服务器名称和端口号）。但是，如果要从RFC 5280指定的ldap URI中检索证书或CRL，请改用 URICertStoreParameters ,因为URI可能包含其他信息，例如专有名称，这将有助于LDAP CertStore查找特定的证书和CRL。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to provide necessary configuration parameters through a URI as defined in RFC 5280 to implementations of CertStore algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于通过RFC 5280中定义的URI向 CertStore 算法的实现提供必要的配置参数。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to provide necessary configuration parameters to implementations of the Collection CertStore algorithm. The only parameter included in this class is the Collection from which the CertStore will retrieve certificates and CRLs.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于为Collection CertStore 算法的实现提供必要的配置参数。此类中唯一包含的参数是 Collection ， CertStore 将从该Collection中检索证书和CRL。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to read entries from a zip file.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于从 zip 文件中读取条目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to represent a JAR file entry.
trans-unit.target: 这个类用来表示一个JAR文件条目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to represent a ZIP file entry.
trans-unit.target: 这个类用来表示一个ZIP文件条目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to represent an Identity that can also digitally sign data.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于表示一个也能对数据进行数字签名的个人信息。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to restrict the usage of the Kerberos delegation model, ie: forwardable and proxiable tickets.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于限制 Kerberos 授权模型的使用,即:可转发和可代理票据。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to set the maximum number of inbound/outbound streams used by the local endpoint during association initialization.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于设置本地端点在关联初始化期间使用的最大入站/出站流数。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to set the maximum number of inbound/outbound streams used by the local endpoint during association initialization. An instance of this class is used to set the SCTP_INIT_MAXSTREAMS socket option.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于设置关联初始化期间本地终结点使用的最大入站/出站流。此类的实例用于设置 SCTP_INIT_MAXSTREAMS 套接字选项。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to specify any algorithm parameters that are determined by a standard name.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于指定任何由标准名称确定的算法参数。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to specify any algorithm parameters that are determined by a standard name. This class also holds constants for standard parameter set names. The names of these constants exactly match the corresponding parameter set name. For example, NamedParameterSpec.X25519 represents the parameter set identified by the string "X25519". These strings are defined in the Java Security Standard Algorithm Names Specification.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于指定由标准名称确定的任何算法参数。此类还保存标准参数集名称的常量。这些常量的名称与相应的参数集名称完全匹配。例如，NamedParameterSpec.X25519表示由字符串“ X25519”标识的参数集。这些字符串在Java安全标准算法名称规范中定义。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to specify any algorithm parameters that are determined by a standard name. This class also holds constants for standard parameter set names. The names of these constants exactly match the corresponding parameter set name. For example, NamedParameterSpec.X25519 represents the parameter set identified by the string "X25519". These strings are defined in the Java Security Standard Algorithm Names Specification.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于指定由标准名称确定的任何算法参数。此类还保存标准参数集名称的常量。这些常量的名称与相应的参数集名称完全匹配。例如，NamedParameterSpec.X25519表示由字符串“ X25519”标识的参数集。这些字符串在Java安全标准算法名称规范中定义。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with the CHAR_REPLACEMENT attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该类与CHAR_REPLACEMENT属性一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class is usually preferable to AtomicLong when multiple threads update a common sum that is used for purposes such as collecting statistics, not for fine-grained synchronization control. Under low update contention, the two classes have similar characteristics. But under high contention, expected throughput of this class is significantly higher, at the expense of higher space consumption.
trans-unit.target: 当多个线程更新用于诸如收集统计信息而不是用于细粒度的同步控制之类的公共和时，此类通常比 AtomicLong 更可取。在低更新争用下，两个类具有相似的特征。但是在竞争激烈的情况下，此类的预期吞吐量要高得多，但要消耗更多的空间。

trans-unit.source: This class is usually preferable to AtomicLong when multiple threads update a common value that is used for purposes such as collecting statistics, not for fine-grained synchronization control. Under low update contention, the two classes have similar characteristics. But under high contention, expected throughput of this class is significantly higher, at the expense of higher space consumption.
trans-unit.target: 当多个线程更新用于诸如收集统计信息而不是用于细粒度的同步控制之类的公共值时，此类通常比 AtomicLong 更可取。在低更新争用下，两个类具有相似的特征。但是在竞争激烈的情况下，此类的预期吞吐量要高得多，但要消耗更多的空间。

trans-unit.source: This class is usually preferable to alternatives when multiple threads update a common value that is used for purposes such as summary statistics that are frequently updated but less frequently read.
trans-unit.target: 当多个线程更新一个共同的值时,该类通常优于替代品,该值用于频繁更新但读取频率较低的摘要统计等目的。

trans-unit.source: This class loader is used to load classes and resources from a search path of URLs referring to both JAR files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个类加载器用于从引用JAR文件和目录的URL搜索路径中加载类和资源。

trans-unit.source: This class loader is used to load classes and resources from a search path of URLs referring to both JAR files and directories. Any jar: scheme URL (see JarURLConnection) is assumed to refer to a JAR file. Any file: scheme URL that ends with a '/' is assumed to refer to a directory. Otherwise, the URL is assumed to refer to a JAR file which will be opened as needed.
trans-unit.target: 该类加载器用于从同时引用JAR文件和目录的URL的搜索路径中加载类和资源。假定任何 jar: 方案URL（请参阅 JarURLConnection ）都引用一个JAR文件。任何以'/'结尾的 file: 方案URL都假定是指目录。否则，假定该URL指向将根据需要打开的JAR文件。

trans-unit.source: This class loader is used to load classes and resources from a search path of URLs referring to both JAR files and directories. Any URL that ends with a '/' is assumed to refer to a directory. Otherwise, the URL is assumed to refer to a JAR file which will be opened as needed.
trans-unit.target: 这个类加载器用于从搜索路径中加载类和资源,这些URL既指向JAR文件,也指向目录。任何以'/'结尾的URL都被认为是指向一个目录。否则,URL被认为是指向一个JAR文件,该文件将根据需要被打开。

trans-unit.source: This class loader supports the loading of classes and resources from the contents of a multi-release JAR file that is referred to by a given URL.
trans-unit.target: 该类加载器支持从给定URL引用的多版本JAR文件的内容中加载类和资源。

trans-unit.source: This class loosely implements the java.util.Vector API, in that it implements the 1.1.x version of java.util.Vector, has no collection class support, and notifies the ListDataListeners when changes occur.
trans-unit.target: 此类松散地实现了 java.util.Vector API，因为它实现了 java.util.Vector 的1.1.x版本，不支持集合类，并在发生更改时通知 ListDataListener 。

trans-unit.source: This class loosely implements the java.util.Vector API, in that it implements the 1.1.x version of java.util.Vector, has no collection class support, and notifies the ListDataListeners when changes occur. Presently it delegates to a Vector, in a future release it will be a real Collection implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类松散地实现了 java.util.Vector API，因为它实现了 java.util.Vector 的1.1.x版本，不支持集合类，并在发生更改时通知 ListDataListener 。目前，它委托给 Vector ，在将来的版本中，它将是一个真正的Collection实现。

trans-unit.source: This class manages a list of dated timer notifications. A method allows users to add/remove as many notifications as required. When a timer notification is emitted by the timer and becomes obsolete, it is automatically removed from the list of timer notifications.
trans-unit.target: 该类管理一个日期定时器通知的列表。一个方法允许用户根据需要添加/删除任意数量的通知。当定时器发出的定时器通知变得过时时,它会自动从定时器通知列表中删除。

trans-unit.source: This class manages repaint requests, allowing the number of repaints to be minimized, for example by collapsing multiple requests into a single repaint for members of a component tree.
trans-unit.target: 该类管理重绘请求,允许将重绘的数量降到最低,例如通过将多个请求折叠成一个组件树成员的单一重绘。

trans-unit.source: This class manages the configuration of time-zone rules. The static methods provide the public API that can be used to manage the providers. The abstract methods provide the SPI that allows rules to be provided.
trans-unit.target: 该类管理时区规则的配置。静态方法提供了可用于管理提供者的公共API。抽象方法提供了允许提供规则的SPI。

trans-unit.source: This class may also be used to construct MXBeans. The usage is exactly the same as for Standard MBeans except that in the examples above, the false parameter to the constructor or super(...) invocation is instead true.
trans-unit.target: 此类也可以用于构造MXBean。用法与标准MBean完全相同，只是在上面的示例中，构造函数或 super(...) 调用的 false 参数改为 true 。

trans-unit.source: This class may also serve as a convenient base for subclasses that generate items, and use the methods in this class to publish them. For example here is a class that periodically publishes the items generated from a supplier. (In practice you might add methods to independently start and stop generation, to share Executors among publishers, and so on, or use a SubmissionPublisher as a component rather than a superclass.)
trans-unit.target: 这个类也可以作为生成物品的子类的方便基础,并使用这个类中的方法来发布它们。例如,这里是一个定期发布供应商生成的项目的类。(在实践中,你可能会添加方法来独立地开始和停止生成,在发布者之间共享Executors等等,或者使用SubmissionPublisher作为一个组件而不是一个超级类。)

trans-unit.source: This class models a quantity or amount of time in terms of seconds and nanoseconds. It can be accessed using other duration-based units, such as minutes and hours. In addition, the DAYS unit can be used and is treated as exactly equal to 24 hours, thus ignoring daylight savings effects. See Period for the date-based equivalent to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类以秒和纳秒为单位对时间量或时间量进行建模。可以使用其他基于持续时间的单位（例如分钟和小时）来访问它。此外，可以使用 DAYS 单位并将其视为完全等于24小时，因此忽略了夏时制效果。有关此类的基于日期的等效项，请参见 Period 。

trans-unit.source: This class models a quantity or amount of time in terms of years, months and days. See Duration for the time-based equivalent to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类以年，月和日为单位对时间量或时间量进行建模。有关此类的基于时间的等效信息，请参见 Duration 。

trans-unit.source: This class models a single instantaneous point on the time-line. This might be used to record event time-stamps in the application.
trans-unit.target: 该类在时间线上模拟一个单一的瞬时点。它可以用来记录应用程序中的事件时间戳。

trans-unit.source: This class must be implemented with care to ensure other classes operate correctly. All implementations that can be instantiated must be final, immutable and thread-safe. Subclasses should be Serializable wherever possible.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的实现必须谨慎,以确保其他类的正确运行。所有可以实例化的实现必须是最终的、不可变的和线程安全的。子类应该尽可能的Serializable。

trans-unit.source: This class offers constant time performance for the basic operations (add, remove, contains and size), assuming the hash function disperses the elements properly among the buckets. Iterating over this set requires time proportional to the sum of the HashSet instance's size (the number of elements) plus the "capacity" of the backing HashMap instance (the number of buckets). Thus, it's very important not to set the initial capacity too high (or the load factor too low) if iteration performance is important.
trans-unit.target: 该类为基本操作（ add ， remove ， contains 和 size ）提供恒定的时间性能，假设hash函数将元素正确地分散在存储桶中。遍历此集合需要的时间与 HashSet 实例的大小（元素的数量）加上后备 HashMap 实例的“容量” （存储桶的数量）之和成比例。因此，如果迭代性能很重要，则不要将初始容量设置得过高（或负载因子过低），这一点非常重要。

trans-unit.source: This class only stores a reference to the array or List so if an element of the underlying sequence changes, it's up to the application to notify the ChangeListeners by calling fireStateChanged.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅存储对数组或 List 的引用，因此，如果基础序列的元素发生更改，则由应用程序通过调用 fireStateChanged 来通知 ChangeListeners 。

trans-unit.source: This class operates with BufferedImage data in which color components are premultiplied with the alpha component. If the Source BufferedImage has an alpha component, and the color components are not premultiplied with the alpha component, then the data are premultiplied before being convolved. If the Destination has color components which are not premultiplied, then alpha is divided out before storing into the Destination (if alpha is 0, the color components are set to 0). If the Destination has no alpha component, then the resulting alpha is discarded after first dividing it out of the color components.
trans-unit.target: 该类对BufferedImage数据进行操作,其中的颜色成分与alpha成分进行了预乘。如果源BufferedImage有一个alpha分量,而颜色分量没有与alpha分量预乘,那么数据在被卷积之前会被预乘。如果Destination有没有预乘的颜色分量,那么在存储到Destination之前,先把alpha分量划分出来(如果alpha为0,则颜色分量设置为0)。如果Destination没有alpha组件,那么在首先将其从颜色组件中划分出来后,将丢弃产生的alpha。

trans-unit.source: This class performs a pixel-by-pixel color conversion of the data in the source image.
trans-unit.target: 该类对源图像中的数据进行逐像素的颜色转换。

trans-unit.source: This class performs a pixel-by-pixel color conversion of the data in the source image. The resulting color values are scaled to the precision of the destination image. Color conversion can be specified via an array of ColorSpace objects or an array of ICC_Profile objects.
trans-unit.target: 该类对源图像中的数据进行逐像素的颜色转换。所得到的颜色值将被缩放到目标图像的精度。颜色转换可以通过ColorSpace对象数组或ICC_Profile对象数组来指定。

trans-unit.source: This class performs a pixel-by-pixel rescaling of the data in the source image by multiplying the sample values for each pixel by a scale factor and then adding an offset.
trans-unit.target: 该类通过将每个像素的采样值乘以比例因子,然后加上偏移量,对源图像中的数据进行逐像素重新缩放。

trans-unit.source: This class performs a pixel-by-pixel rescaling of the data in the source image by multiplying the sample values for each pixel by a scale factor and then adding an offset. The scaled sample values are clipped to the minimum/maximum representable in the destination image.
trans-unit.target: 该类通过将每个像素的采样值乘以一个比例因子,然后加上一个偏移量,对源图像中的数据进行逐像素的重新缩放。缩放后的样本值被剪切到目标图像中的最小/最大值。

trans-unit.source: This class performs an arbitrary linear combination of the bands in a Raster, using a specified matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用指定的矩阵对 Raster 中的波段执行任意线性组合。

trans-unit.source: This class performs the synchronization required to implement the Channel specification. Implementations of the implCloseChannel method need not synchronize against other threads that might be attempting to close the channel.
trans-unit.target: 此类执行实现 Channel 规范所需的同步。 implCloseChannel 方法的实现无需与其他可能试图关闭通道的线程进行同步。

trans-unit.source: This class performs the synchronization required to implement the Channel specification. Implementations of the implCloseChannel method need not synchronize against other threads that might be attempting to close the channel.
trans-unit.target: 此类执行实现 Channel 规范所需的同步。 implCloseChannel 方法的实现无需与其他可能试图关闭通道的线程进行同步。

trans-unit.source: This class properly reads and retrieves values placed in the UIDefaults according to the standard Nimbus naming conventions. It will create and retrieve painters, fonts, colors, and other data stored there.
trans-unit.target: 这个类根据标准的Nimbus命名惯例正确地读取和检索放在UIDefaults中的值。它将创建和检索画符、字体、颜色和其他存储在其中的数据。

trans-unit.source: This class provides adapt methods for Runnable and Callable, that may be of use when mixing execution of ForkJoinTasks with other kinds of tasks. When all tasks are of this form, consider using a pool constructed in asyncMode.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了 Runnable 和 Callable 的 adapt 方法，在将 ForkJoinTasks 的执行与其他类型的任务混合使用时可能会用到。当所有任务都采用这种形式时，请考虑使用在asyncMode中构造的池。

trans-unit.source: This class provides protected overridable beforeExecute(Thread, Runnable) and afterExecute(Runnable, Throwable) methods that are called before and after execution of each task. These can be used to manipulate the execution environment; for example, reinitializing ThreadLocals, gathering statistics, or adding log entries. Additionally, method terminated() can be overridden to perform any special processing that needs to be done once the Executor has fully terminated.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 protected 可重写的 beforeExecute(Thread, Runnable) 和 afterExecute(Runnable, Throwable) 方法，这些方法在执行每个任务之前和之后调用。这些可以用来操纵执行环境。例如，重新初始化ThreadLocals，收集统计信息或添加日志条目。另外，一旦执行程序完全终止，可以重写方法 terminated() 来执行需要执行的任何特殊处理。

trans-unit.source: This class provides protected overridable beforeExecute(Thread, Runnable) and afterExecute(Runnable, Throwable) methods that are called before and after execution of each task. These can be used to manipulate the execution environment; for example, reinitializing ThreadLocals, gathering statistics, or adding log entries. Additionally, method terminated() can be overridden to perform any special processing that needs to be done once the Executor has fully terminated.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 protected 可重写的 beforeExecute(Thread, Runnable) 和 afterExecute(Runnable, Throwable) 方法，这些方法在执行每个任务之前和之后调用。这些可以用来操纵执行环境。例如，重新初始化ThreadLocals，收集统计信息或添加日志条目。此外，一旦执行程序完全终止，可以重写方法 terminated() 以执行需要执行的任何特殊处理。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a DOM-specific implementation of the XMLCryptoContext interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 XMLCryptoContext 接口的DOM特定实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a DOM-specific implementation of the XMLCryptoContext interface. It also includes additional methods that are specific to a DOM-based implementation for registering and retrieving elements that contain attributes of type ID.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 XMLCryptoContext 接口的DOM特定实现。它还包括特定于基于DOM的实现的其他方法，用于注册和检索包含ID类型的属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a basic file object implementation which can be used as building block for creating file objects. For example, here is how to define a file object which represent source code stored in a string:
trans-unit.target: 这个类提供了一个基本的文件对象实现,它可以作为创建文件对象的构件。例如,这里是如何定义一个文件对象,它代表存储在字符串中的源代码。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a basic implementation of the Attribute interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 Attribute 接口的基本实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a basic implementation of the Control interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 Control 接口的基本实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a basic implementation of the Control interface. It represents an LDAPv3 Control as defined in RFC 2251.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 Control 接口的基本实现。它代表RFC 2251中定义的LDAPv3控件。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a basic implementation of the Control interface. It represents an LDAPv3 Control as defined in RFC 2251.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 Control 接口的基本实现。它代表RFC 2251中定义的LDAPv3控件。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a basic implementation of the Attributes interface.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了Attributes接口的基本实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a convenience implementation of the SAX AttributeList interface. This implementation is useful both for SAX parser writers, who can use it to provide attributes to the application, and for SAX application writers, who can use it to create a persistent copy of an element's attribute specifications:
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了SAX AttributeList 接口的便捷实现。此实现对于既可以使用它来为应用程序提供属性的SAX解析器编写者，又可以使用它来创建元素的属性规范的持久性副本的SAX应用程序写者都非常有用：

trans-unit.source: This class provides a cryptographically strong random number generator (RNG).
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一个加密的强随机数发生器(RNG)。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a default implementation of the SAX2 Attributes interface, with the addition of manipulators so that the list can be modified or reused.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供SAX2 Attributes 接口的默认实现，并带有操纵器，以便可以修改或重新使用列表。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a number of methods that make it easy to use for the duration datatype of XML Schema 1.0 with the errata.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一些方法,使其易于使用带有勘误表的XML Schema 1.0的duration数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a policy for the various JInternalFrame methods, it is not meant to be called directly rather the various JInternalFrame methods will call into the DesktopManager.
trans-unit.target: 这个类为各种JInternalFrame方法提供了一个策略,它并不是要直接调用,而是各种JInternalFrame方法会调用到DesktopManager中。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a set of basic arithmetic operations, such as addition, subtraction and multiplication. Because durations don't have total order, an operation could fail for some combinations of operations. For example, you cannot subtract 15 days from 1 month. See the javadoc of those methods for detailed conditions where this could happen.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一组基本的算术运算,如加法、减法和乘法。因为持续时间没有总的顺序,所以对于某些运算组合,一个运算可能会失败。例如,你不能从1个月中减去15天。请参阅这些方法的javadoc,了解可能发生这种情况的详细情况。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the List interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface backed by a "random access" data store (such as an array).
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 List 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现由“随机访问”数据存储（例如数组）支持的该接口所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the List interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface backed by a "random access" data store (such as an array). For sequential access data (such as a linked list), AbstractSequentialList should be used in preference to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 List 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现由“随机访问”数据存储（例如数组）支持的该接口所需的工作。对于顺序访问数据（例如链表），应优先使用 AbstractSequentialList 代替此类。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Preferences class, greatly easing the task of implementing it.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了 Preferences 类的基本实现，从而大大简化了实现它的任务。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Collection interface, to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了 Collection 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现此接口所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the List interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface backed by a "sequential access" data store (such as a linked list).
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了 List 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现由“顺序访问”数据存储（例如链表）支持的该接口所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the List interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface backed by a "sequential access" data store (such as a linked list). For random access data (such as an array), AbstractList should be used in preference to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了 List 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现由“顺序访问”数据存储（例如链表）支持的该接口所需的工作。对于随机访问数据（例如数组），应优先使用 AbstractList 来代替此类。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Map interface, to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 Map 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现此接口所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Set interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 Set 接口的基本实现，以最大程度地减少实现此接口所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the type information determined by ValidatorHandler.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对 ValidatorHandler 确定的类型信息的访问。

trans-unit.source: This class provides additional methods for generating random streams, that employ the above techniques when used in stream.parallel() mode.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了用于生成随机流的其他方法，该方法在 stream.parallel() 模式下使用时会采用上述技术。

trans-unit.source: This class provides additional methods for generating random streams, that employ the above techniques when used in stream.parallel() mode.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了用于生成随机流的其他方法，该方法在 stream.parallel() 模式下使用时会采用上述技术。

trans-unit.source: This class provides all of the optional Map operations, and permits null elements. Like HashMap, it provides constant-time performance for the basic operations (add, contains and remove), assuming the hash function disperses elements properly among the buckets. Performance is likely to be just slightly below that of HashMap, due to the added expense of maintaining the linked list, with one exception: Iteration over the collection-views of a LinkedHashMap requires time proportional to the
trans-unit.target: 此类提供所有可选的 Map 操作，并允许空元素。像 HashMap 一样，它为基本操作（ add ， contains 和 remove ）提供恒定时间的性能，假设hash函数将元素正确地分布在存储桶中。由于维护链接列表会增加开销，因此性能可能会略低于 HashMap ，但有一个例外：在 LinkedHashMap 的集合视图上进行迭代需要的时间与

trans-unit.source: This class provides all of the optional Set operations, and permits null elements. Like HashSet, it provides constant-time performance for the basic operations (add, contains and remove), assuming the hash function disperses elements properly among the buckets. Performance is likely to be just slightly below that of HashSet, due to the added expense of maintaining the linked list, with one exception: Iteration over a LinkedHashSet requires time proportional to the
trans-unit.target: 此类提供所有可选的 Set 操作，并允许空元素。像 HashSet 一样，它为基本操作（ add ， contains 和 remove ）提供恒定时间的性能，假设hash函数将元素正确地分布在存储桶中。由于维护链接列表会增加开销，因此性能可能会略低于 HashSet ，但有一个例外：通过 LinkedHashSet 进行迭代所需的时间与HashSet的时间成正比。

trans-unit.source: This class provides all of the optional map operations, and permits null values and the null key. This class makes no guarantees as to the order of the map; in particular, it does not guarantee that the order will remain constant over time.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供所有可选的映射操作，并允许 null 值和 null 键。此类无法保证地图的顺序。特别是，它不能保证顺序会随着时间的推移保持恒定。

trans-unit.source: This class provides an easy way to create an ImageFilter which modifies the pixels of an image in the default RGB ColorModel.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一种创建ImageFilter的简单方法,它可以在默认的RGB ColorModel中修改图像的像素。

trans-unit.source: This class provides an easy way to create an ImageFilter which modifies the pixels of an image in the default RGB ColorModel. It is meant to be used in conjunction with a FilteredImageSource object to produce filtered versions of existing images. It is an abstract class that provides the calls needed to channel all of the pixel data through a single method which converts pixels one at a time in the default RGB ColorModel regardless of the ColorModel being used by the ImageProducer. The only method which needs to be defined to create a useable image filter is the filterRGB method. Here is an example of a definition of a filter which swaps the red and blue components of an image:
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一种创建ImageFilter的简单方法,它可以修改默认RGB ColorModel中的图像像素。它的目的是与FilteredImageSource对象一起使用,以产生现有图像的过滤版本。它是一个抽象类,它提供了通过一个单一的方法调用所有的像素数据,该方法在默认的RGB ColorModel中一次转换一个像素,不管ImageProducer使用的是什么ColorModel。唯一需要定义的方法是filterRGB方法来创建一个可用的图像过滤器。下面是一个定义滤镜的例子,它可以交换图像中的红色和蓝色部分。

trans-unit.source: This class provides an efficient and scalable basis for synchronization in part by specializing its range of use to synchronizers that can rely on int state, acquire, and release parameters, and an internal FIFO wait queue. When this does not suffice, you can build synchronizers from a lower level using atomic classes, your own custom Queue classes, and LockSupport blocking support.
trans-unit.target: 此类为同步提供了有效且可扩展的基础，部分原因是将其使用范围专门用于可以依赖于 int 状态，获取和释放参数以及内部FIFO等待队列的同步器。如果这还不够，您可以使用 atomic 类，您自己的自定义 Queue 类和 LockSupport 阻止支持从较低级别构建同步器。

trans-unit.source: This class provides an implementation of LazyValue which can be used to delay loading of the Class for the instance to be created.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 LazyValue 的实现，该实现可用于延迟要创建的实例的Class的加载。

trans-unit.source: This class provides an implementation of LazyValue which can be used to delay loading of the Class for the instance to be created. It also avoids creation of an anonymous inner class for the LazyValue subclass. Both of these improve performance at the time that a a Look and Feel is loaded, at the cost of a slight performance reduction the first time createValue is called (since Reflection APIs are used).
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 LazyValue 的实现，该实现可用于延迟要创建的实例的Class的加载。它还避免为 LazyValue 子类创建匿名内部类。这两者都在加载外观时提高了性能，但以第一次 createValue 性能稍有降低为代价（因为使用了反射API）。

trans-unit.source: This class provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate for JTableHeader entries.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了适合JTableHeader条目的Java Accessibility API的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides common implementations of TemporalQuery. These are defined here as they must be constants, and the definition of lambdas does not guarantee that. By assigning them once here, they become 'normal' Java constants.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 TemporalQuery 的通用实现。这些在这里定义是因为它们必须是常量，而lambda的定义不能保证这一点。通过在此处分配一次，它们将成为“常规” Java常数。

trans-unit.source: This class provides constant-time performance for the basic operations (get and put), assuming the system identity hash function (System.identityHashCode(Object)) disperses elements properly among the buckets.
trans-unit.target: 假定系统身份哈希函数（ System.identityHashCode(Object) ）将元素正确分散在各个存储桶中，则此类为基本操作（ get 和 put ）提供了恒定时间的性能。

trans-unit.source: This class provides constant-time performance for the basic operations (get and put), assuming the system identity hash function (System.identityHashCode(Object)) disperses elements properly among the buckets.
trans-unit.target: 假定系统身份哈希函数（ System.identityHashCode(Object) ）将元素正确分散在各个存储桶中，则此类为基本操作（ get 和 put ）提供恒定时间的性能。

trans-unit.source: This class provides default implementations for the JFC Action interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了JFC Action 接口的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides default implementations for the JFC Action interface. Standard behaviors like the get and set methods for Action object properties (icon, text, and enabled) are defined here. The developer need only subclass this abstract class and define the actionPerformed method.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了JFC Action 接口的默认实现。此处定义了标准行为，例如 Action 对象属性（图标，文本和已启用）的get和set方法。开发人员只需将此抽象类的子类化，并定义 actionPerformed 方法。

trans-unit.source: This class provides default implementations of several Image methods for classes that want to implement the MultiResolutionImage interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类为要实现 MultiResolutionImage 接口的类提供了几种 Image 方法的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides default implementations of several Image methods for classes that want to implement the MultiResolutionImage interface. For example,
trans-unit.target: 此类为要实现 MultiResolutionImage 接口的类提供了几种 Image 方法的默认实现。例如，

trans-unit.source: This class provides definitions of the notifications sent by timer MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了定时器MBeans发送的通知的定义。

trans-unit.source: This class provides enumerations for efficiently traversing a tree or subtree in various orders or for following the path between two nodes. A DefaultMutableTreeNode may also hold a reference to a user object, the use of which is left to the user. Asking a DefaultMutableTreeNode for its string representation with toString() returns the string representation of its user object.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供枚举，以有效地以各种顺序遍历树或子树或遵循两个节点之间的路径。甲 DefaultMutableTreeNode 还可以保存到用户对象，它的使用留给用户一个参考。使用 toString() 向 DefaultMutableTreeNode 要求其字符串表示形式将返回其用户对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This class provides inspection, instrumentation, and monitoring methods for the internal queue, as well as similar methods for condition objects. These can be exported as desired into classes using an AbstractQueuedSynchronizer for their synchronization mechanics.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了内部队列的检查，检测和监视方法，以及条件对象的类似方法。可以根据需要使用 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 将它们导出到类中以实现其同步机制。

trans-unit.source: This class provides mechanisms to specify a source region and a destination region. When reading, the source is the stream and the in-memory image is the destination. When writing, these are reversed. In the case of writing, destination regions may be used only with a writer that supports pixel replacement.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了指定源区域和目标区域的机制。当读取时,源是流,内存中的图像是目标。写入时,这些是相反的。在写入的情况下,目标区域只能与支持像素替换的写入器一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class provides methods corresponding to these operations. The methods look for the associated application registered on the current platform, and launch it to handle a URI or file. If there is no associated application or the associated application fails to be launched, an exception is thrown. Please see Desktop.Action for the full list of supported operations and capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供与这些操作相对应的方法。这些方法查找在当前平台上注册的关联应用程序，并启动它以处理URI或文件。如果没有关联的应用程序或关联的应用程序无法启动，则会引发异常。有关支持的操作和功能的完整列表，请参见 Desktop.Action 。

trans-unit.source: This class provides methods for accessing the response status code, headers, the response body, and the HttpRequest corresponding to this response.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了用于访问响应状态代码，标头，响应主体以及与此响应相对应的 HttpRequest 的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class provides methods to select and query nested objects by passing a dot "." delimited String object (for instance, "aaa.bbb"). A method evaluates a nested object from left to right, and if a part is null, it throws NullPointerException.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供通过传递点 "." 来选择和查询嵌套对象的方法。分隔的 String 对象（例如， "aaa.bbb" ）。方法从左到右评估嵌套对象，如果part为 null ，则抛出 NullPointerException 。

trans-unit.source: This class provides services needed to instrument Java programming language code.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了仪表Java编程语言代码所需的服务。

trans-unit.source: This class provides services needed to instrument Java programming language code. Instrumentation is the addition of byte-codes to methods for the purpose of gathering data to be utilized by tools. Since the changes are purely additive, these tools do not modify application state or behavior. Examples of such benign tools include monitoring agents, profilers, coverage analyzers, and event loggers.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了工具化Java编程语言代码所需的服务。仪表化是将字节码添加到方法中,目的是收集数据,以便被工具利用。由于变化是纯粹的添加,这些工具不会修改应用程序的状态或行为。这种良性工具的例子包括监控代理、剖析器、覆盖率分析器和事件记录器。

trans-unit.source: This class provides skeletal implementations of some Queue operations.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了一些 Queue 操作的基本实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides skeletal implementations of some Queue operations. The implementations in this class are appropriate when the base implementation does not allow null elements. Methods add, remove, and element are based on offer, poll, and peek, respectively, but throw exceptions instead of indicating failure via false or null returns.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供一些 Queue 操作的基本实现。当基实现并在这个类的实现是合适的不是允许 null 元素。方法 add ， remove 和 element 分别基于 offer ， poll 和 peek ，但是抛出异常而不是通过 false 或 null 返回指示失败。

trans-unit.source: This class provides skeletal implementations of some Queue operations. The implementations in this class are appropriate when the base implementation does not allow null elements. Methods add, remove, and element are based on offer, poll, and peek, respectively, but throw exceptions instead of indicating failure via false or null returns.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了一些 Queue 操作的基本实现。当基实现并在这个类的实现是合适的不是允许 null 元素。方法 add ， remove 和 element 分别基于 offer ， poll 和 peek ，但是抛出异常而不是通过 false 或 null 返回指示失败。

trans-unit.source: This class provides some general purpose beans control methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个类提供了一些通用的bean控制方法。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for AccessibleHypertext, and is used in instances where the EditorKit installed in this JEditorPane is an instance of HTMLEditorKit.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对 AccessibleHypertext 的支持，并且在此 JEditorPane 安装的 EditorKit 是 HTMLEditorKit 的实例的情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for general purpose compression using the popular ZLIB compression library.
trans-unit.target: 该类为使用流行的ZLIB压缩库的通用压缩提供支持。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for general purpose compression using the popular ZLIB compression library. The ZLIB compression library was initially developed as part of the PNG graphics standard and is not protected by patents. It is fully described in the specifications at the java.util.zip package description.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了使用流行的ZLIB压缩库的通用压缩的支持。ZLIB压缩库最初是作为PNG图形标准的一部分开发的，不受专利保护。在java.util.zip软件包说明中的规范中对其进行了全面描述。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for general purpose compression using the popular ZLIB compression library. The ZLIB compression library was initially developed as part of the PNG graphics standard and is not protected by patents. It is fully described in the specifications at the java.util.zip package description.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用流行的ZLIB压缩库提供对通用压缩的支持。ZLIB压缩库最初是作为PNG图形标准的一部分开发的，不受专利保护。在java.util.zip软件包描述中的规范中对其进行了全面描述。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for general purpose decompression using the popular ZLIB compression library.
trans-unit.target: 该类为使用流行的ZLIB压缩库的通用解压缩提供支持。

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for general purpose decompression using the popular ZLIB compression library. The ZLIB compression library was initially developed as part of the PNG graphics standard and is not protected by patents. It is fully described in the specifications at the java.util.zip package description.

trans-unit.source: This class provides support for general purpose decompression using the popular ZLIB compression library. The ZLIB compression library was initially developed as part of the PNG graphics standard and is not protected by patents. It is fully described in the specifications at the java.util.zip package description.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the ChangeListener part of the SpinnerModel interface that should be suitable for most concrete SpinnerModel implementations.
trans-unit.target: 这个类提供了SpinnerModel接口的ChangeListener部分,应该适用于大多数具体的SpinnerModel实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the ChangeListener part of the SpinnerModel interface that should be suitable for most concrete SpinnerModel implementations. Subclasses must provide an implementation of the setValue, getValue, getNextValue and getPreviousValue methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了SpinnerModel接口的ChangeListener部分，该部分应该适合大多数具体的SpinnerModel实现。子类必须提供 setValue ， getValue ， getNextValue 和 getPreviousValue 方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality of a "Message Authentication Code" (MAC) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了 "消息验证码"(MAC)算法的功能。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality of a cryptographic cipher for encryption and decryption.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了加密和解密的加密密码的功能。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality of a cryptographic cipher for encryption and decryption. It forms the core of the Java Cryptographic Extension (JCE) framework.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了加密和解密的加密密码的功能。它构成了Java密码学扩展(JCE)框架的核心。
